
1a1(mdo 'grel): chos mngon pa mdzod ces bya ba slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa bzhugs so//
221(mdo 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ a b+hi d+harma ko ShA kA ri kA/ bod skad du/ chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi tshig le'ur byas pa/
222(mdo 'grel): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig kun la mun pa gtan bcom zhing/ /'khor ba'i 'dam
223(mdo 'grel): las 'gro ba drangs mdzad pa/ /don bzhin ston pa de la phyag 'tshal nas/ /chos mngon mdzod kyi bstan bcos rab
224(mdo 'grel): bshad bya/ /chos mngon shes rab dri med rjes 'brang bcas/ /de thob bya phyir gang dang bstan bcos gang/ /
2a1(mdo 'grel): 'dir de don du yang dag chud phyir ram/ /'di yi gnas de yin pas chos mngon mdzod/ /chos rnams rab tu
2a2(mdo 'grel): rnam 'byed med par nyon mongs rnams/ /gang phyir nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i thabs med la/ /nyon mongs pas kyang 'jig rten srid mtsho
2a3(mdo 'grel): 'dir 'khyams te/ /de bas de phyir 'di ni ston pas gsungs so lo/ /zag bcas zag pa med chos rnams/ /lam ma gtogs pa'i
2a4(mdo 'grel): 'dus byas rnams/ /zag bcas gang phyir de dag la/ /zag rnams kun tu rgyas par 'gyur/ /zag med lam gyi bden pa dang/ /
2b1(mdo 'grel): 'dus ma byas rnam gsum yang ste/ /nam mkha' dang ni 'gog pa gnyis/ /de la nam mkha' mi sgrib pa/ /so sor btags pas 'gog pa gang/ /bral ba so so
2b2(mdo 'grel): so so yin/ /skye la gtan du gegs byed pa/ /'gog gzhan so sor brtags min pas/ /'dus byas chos rnams de dag kyang/ /gzugs la sogs pa'i phung
2b3(mdo 'grel): po lnga/ /de dag nyid dus gtam gzhi dang/ /nges par 'byung bcas gzhi dang bcas/ /gang dag zag bcas nyer len pa'i/ /phung po'ang de dag 'thab bcas kyang//
2b4(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'jig rten dang/ /lta gnas srid pa'ang de dag yin/ /gzugs ni dbang po lnga dang don/ /lnga dang rnam rig byed min nyid de dag rnams kyi rnam
2b5(mdo 'grel): shes rten/ /mig la sogs gzugs dang ba rnams/ /gzugs rnam gnyis dang rnam nyi shu/ /sgra ni rnam pa brgyad yod de/ /ro ni rnam drug dri zhim bzhi/ /reg bya
3a1(mdo 'grel): bcu gcig bdag nyid do/ /g.yengs dang sems med pa yi yang/ /dge dang mi dge rjes 'brel gang/ /'byung ba che rnams rgyur byas pa/ /de ni
3a2(mdo 'grel): rnam rig byed min brjod/ /'byung ba dag ni sa khams dang/ /chu dang me dang rlung khams rnams/ /'dzin pa la sogs las su grub/ /srag sher dro nyid g.yo ba rnams/
3a3(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten gyi ni tha snyad du/ /kha dog dbyibs las zhes brjod/ /chu me yan ngo rlung tshogs khams/ /nyid yin de dang 'dra ba'ang yin/ /dbang don de dag kho na la/ /skye mched
3a4(mdo 'grel): dang ni khams bcur 'dod/ /tshor ba myong ba'o 'du shes na/ /mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid do/ /'du byed phung po bzhi las gzhan/ /de gsum rnam rig byed min dang/ /
3a5(mdo 'grel): 'dus ma byas rnams bcas pa ni/ /chos kyi skye mched khams zhes bya/ /rnam shes so sor rnam rig pa/ /yid kyi skye mched kyang de yin/ /khams bdun dag tuAng 'dod
3b1(mdo 'grel): pa ste/ /rnam par shes pa drug dang yid/ /drug po 'das ma thag pa yi/ /rnam shes gang yin de yid do/ /drug pa'i rten ni rab sgrub phyir/ /khams ni bco brgyad dag tu 'dod/ /phung po dang ni skye mched dang//
3b2(mdo 'grel): khams gcig gis ni thams cad bsdus/ /rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis te/ /gzhan gyi dngos dang mi ldan phyir/ /mig la sogs pa gnyis mod kyi/ /rigs dang spyod yul rnam par shes/ /'dra ba'i phyir na
3b3(mdo 'grel): khams gcig nyid/ /mdzes bya'i phyir na gnyis 'byung ngo/ /spungs dang skye sgo rigs kyi don/ /phung po skye mched khams rnams yin/ /rmongs dbang 'dod rnam gsum gyi phyir/ /phung po la sogs
3b4(mdo 'grel): gsum bstan to/ /rtsod pa'i rtsa bar gyur pa dang/ /'khor ba'i rgyu phyir rim rgyu'i phyir/ /sems byung rnams las tshor ba dang/ /'du shes logs shig phung por bzhag /phung po dag tu 'dus ma byas//
3b5(mdo 'grel): don du mi rung phyir ma bshad/ /rim na rigs dang kun nyon mongs/ /snod sogs don khams ji bzhin no/ /de lta'i don phyir dang po lnga/ /'byung ba las gyur don phyir bzhi/ /gzhan ni chos ring myur
3b6(mdo 'grel): 'jug phyir/ /yang na ji ltar gnas bzhin rim/ /bye brag don dang gtso bo'i phyir/ /chos mang ba dang mchog bsdus phyir/ /gcig ni gzugs kyi skye mched dang/ /gcig ni chos zhes bya bar brjod//
4a1(mdo 'grel): chos kyi phung po brgyad khri dag /gang rnams thub pas gsungs de dag /tshig gam ming yin de rnams ni/ /gzugs dang 'du byed dag tu 'dus/ /kha cig bstan bcos tshad ces zer/ /
4a2(mdo 'grel): phung po la sogs gtam re yin/ /spyod pa rnams kyi gnyen po ni/ /chos kyi phung po mthun par gsungs/ /de bzhin gzhan yang ci rigs par/ /phung po skye mched khams rnams
4a3(mdo 'grel): ni/ /rang gi mtshan nyid legs dpyad de/ /ji skad bshad par bsdu bar bya/ /bu ga nam mkha' i khams shes bya/ /snang dang mun pa dag yin lo/ /zag dang bcas pa'i rnam shes
4a4(mdo 'grel): ni/ /rnam shes khams yin skye ba'i rten/ /bstan yod 'dir ni gzugs gcig pu/ /thogs dang bcas pa gzugs can bcu/ /lung ma bstan brgyad de dag nyid/ /gzugs
4a5(mdo 'grel): sgra ma gtogs gzhan rnam gsum/ /'dod khams gtogs pa thams cad do/ /gzugs kyi khams na bcu bzhi'o/ /dri dang ro dang sna dang ni/ /lce yi rnam shes khams ma
4a6(mdo 'grel): gtogs/ /gzugs med gtogs pa yid dang ni/ /chos dang yid kyi rnam shes khams/ /de gsum zag bcas zag pa med/ /lhag ma rnams ni zag bcas
4b1(mdo 'grel): so/ /rtog dang dpyod dang bcas pa ni/ rnam par shes pa'i khams snga yin/ /tha ma gsum ni rnam gsum mo/ /lhag ma rnams ni gnyis ka spangs/ /nges par rtog dang rjes dran pa'i/ /rnam par rtog pas rnam mi rtog/ /de dag yid gyi shes rab yang/ /yid kyi
4b2(mdo 'grel): dran pa thams cad nyid/ /dmigs bcas sems kyi khams bdun no/ /chos kyi byed kyang ma zin dgu/ /brgyad po de dag rnams dang sgra/ /dgu po gzhan ni rnam pa gnyis/ /reg bya rnam pa gnyis yin te/ /lhag ma gzugs can dgu po ni/ /'byung
4b3(mdo 'grel): gyur chos khams phyogs gcig kyang/ /gzugs can bcu ni bsags pa'o/ /gcod byed gcad par bya ba nyid/ /phyi rol gyi ni khams bzhi yin/ /de bzhin bsreg bya 'jal byed pa'o/ /sreg dang gzhal la mi mthun smra/ /rnam par smin las byung ba dang
4b4(mdo 'grel): rgyas las byung ba nang gi lnga/ /sgra ni rnam smin las skyes min/ /rgyu mthun las byung rnam smin skyes/ /thogs pa med brgyad gzhan rnam gsum/ /rdzas dang lhan gcig tha ma gsum/ /skad cig ma ste mig dang ni/ /rnam shes khams dag so so dang/ /lhan cig
4b5(mdo 'grel): tu yang 'thob pa yod/ /nang gi bcu gnyis gzugs la sogs/ /ma gtogs chos zhes bya ba ni/ /bsten pa dang bcas lhag pa ni/ /de dang mtshungs pa dag kyang yin/ /gang zhig rang gis lam mi byed/ /bcu ni bsgom pas spang bya yin/ /lnga yang tha ma gsum rnam
4b6(mdo 'grel): gsum/ /nyon mongs can min mthong spang min/ /gzugs min drug pa min skyes min/ /mig dang chos kyi khams phyogs ni/ /lta ba yin te rnam pa brgyad/ /rnam shes lnga dang mtshungs skyes blo/ /ngas rtog med phyir lha ma yin/ /mig gis gzugs rnams mthong
4b7(mdo 'grel): brten bcas/ /de la brten pa'i rnam shes min/ /gang phyir bar du tshad pa ni/ /gzugs ni mthong ba min phyir lo/ /mig ni gnyis ka dag gis kyang/ /mthong ste gsal bar mthong phyir ro/ /mig dang yid dang rna ba ni/ /yul dang ma phrad gsum gzhan du/ /sna la
5a1(mdo 'grel): sogs pa gsum gyis ni/ /yul ni mnyam pa 'dzin par 'dod/ /tha ma'i rten 'das lnga rnams kyi/ /de dag lhan cig skyes pa'ang yin/ /de dag gyur pas 'gyur nyid phyir/ /rten ni mig la sogs pa yin/ /de phyir thun mongs ma yin
5a2(mdo 'grel): phyir/ /de dag gis ni rnam shes bstan/ /lus la 'og ma'i mig ma yin/ /mig gi go ma'i gzugs ma yin/ /rnam par shes pa de yi gzugs/ /lus kyi 'ang gnyis ka thams cad du/ /rna ba'ang de bzhin gsum dag ni/ /thams cad rang gi sa pa nyid//
5a3(mdo 'grel): lus kyi rnam shes 'og dang ni/ /rang gi sa yid ma nges te/ /gnyis kyis rnam shes phyi yi lnga/ /'dus ma byas chos rtag pa'o/ /chos kyi phyed dang gang dag ni/ /bcu gnyis nang gir bshad dbang po/ /chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi tshig le'ur byas pa las khams
5a4(mdo 'grel): bstan pa zhes bya ba ste gnas dang po'o// //lnga po rnams ni don bzhi la/ /dbang byed bzhi rnams gnyis la'o/ /lnga dang brgyad po de rnams ni/ /kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang la/ /rang gi don dang thams cad la/ /dmigs par dbang byed
5a5(mdo 'grel): phyir dbang drug /mo nyid pho nyid la dbang phyir/ /lus las mo dang pho'i dbang dag /ris gnas kun nas nyon mongs dang/ /rnam par byang la dbang byed phyir/ /srog dang tshor ba rnams dang ni/ /dad sogs dbang po lngar 'dod do/ /mya ngan 'das sogs
5a6(mdo 'grel): gong nas gong/ /'thob pa la ni dbang byed phyir/ /kun shes byed dang kun shes dang/ /de bzhin kun shes ldan dbang po/ /sems kyi rtan dang de'i bye brag /gnas dang kun nas nyon mongs nyid/ /tshogs dang rnam byang ji snyed pa/ /dbang po dag kyang de snyed du/ /yang
5a7(mdo 'grel): na 'jug pa'i rten dang ni/ /skye dang gnas dang nyer spyod las/ /bcu bzhi de bzhin ldog pa la/ /dbang po rnams ni gzhan yin no/ /lus tshor sim pa ma yin gang/ /sdug bsngal dbang po'o sim ba ni/ /bde ba'o bsam gtan gsum pa na/ /sems kyi
5b1(mdo 'grel): da ni bde dbang po/ /gzhan na de yid bde ba yin/ /sems kyi sim pa ma yin pa/ /yid mi bde ba'o btang snyoms ni/ /bar ma'o gnyis ka'i mi rtog phyir/ /mthong bsgom mi slob lam la dgu/ /gsum yin gsum ni dri ma med/ /gzugs can srog dang
5b2(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal dag/ zag dang bcas pa dgu rnam gnyis/ /srog ni rnam smin bcu gnyis gnyis/ /tha ma brgyad dang yid mi bde/ /ma gtogs pa ste de gcig ni/ /rnam par smin bcas bcu rnam gnyis/ /yid dang tshor gzhan dad la sogs/ /dge ba brgyad
5b3(mdo 'grel): yid mi bde ba/ /rnam gnyis yid dang tshor gzhan ni/ /rnam gsum gzhan ni rnam pa gcig /dri med ma gtogs 'dod par gtogs/ /pho mo'i dbang dang sdug bsngal dag /ma gtogs gzugs gtogs gzugs can dang/ /bde ba'ang ma gtogs gzugs
5b4(mdo 'grel): med gtogs/ /yid dag tshor ba gsum rnam gsum/ /yid kyis spang bya yid mi bde/ /dgu ni bsgom pas lnga ba ni/ /spang bar bya min yang gsum min/ /'dod dang dang por rnam smin gnyis/ /rnyed de brdzus te skye bas min/ /de yis drug gam bdun nam brgyad//
5b5(mdo 'grel): gzugs na drug go gong mar gcig na gzugs med dag tu 'chi ba na/ /srog dang yid dang btang snyoms nyid/ /'gag par 'gyur ro gzugs na brgyad/ /'dod par bcu 'am dgu 'am brgyad/ /rim gyis 'chi ba dag la bzhi/ /dge la thams cad dag tu
5b6(mdo 'grel): lnga/ /'bras bu tha ma gnyis dgus 'thob/ /gnyis ni bdun dang brgyad dang dgus/ /bcu gcig dag gis dgra bcom nyid/ /'ga' zhig srid phyir bshad pa yin/ /btang snyoms dang ni srog dang ni/ /yid dang ldan la nges gsum ldan/ /bde lus ldan
5b7(mdo 'grel): la bzhi dag dang/ /mig sogs ldan la lnga dang ldan/ /yid bde ldan yang sdug bsngal ldan/ /bdun dang mo yi dbang sogs ldan/ /brgyad dang kun shes ldan pa yi/ /dbang po ldan la bcu gcig ldan/ /kun shes byed pa'i dbang ldan la/ /bcu gsum
6a1(mdo 'grel): dag dang ldan pa yin/ /dag med nang na nyung ldan pa/ /lus tshor srog yid brgyad dang ldan/ /gzugs med byis pa'ang de bzhin te/ /btang snyoms srog yid dge rnams dang/ /mang por ldan la bcu dgu ste/ /dri ma med rnams ma
6a2(mdo 'grel): gtogs so/ /mtshan gnyis 'phags pa chags bcas ste/ /mtshan gcig dri med gnyis ma gtogs/ /'dod na dbang po med pa dang/ /sgra med phra rabs rdul rdzas brgyad/ /lus dbang ldan la rdzas dgu'o/ /dbang po gzhan ldan rdzas bcu'o/ /
6a3(mdo 'grel): sems dang sems byung nges lhan cig /thams cad 'dus byas mtshan nyid dang/ /thob pa 'am sems byung rnam lnga ste/ /sa mang la sogs tha dad phyir/ /tshor dang sems pa 'du shes dang/ /'dun dang reg dang blo gros dran/ /yid la byed dang mos
6a4(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /ting nge 'dzin sems thams cad la/ /dad dang bag yod shin tu sbyangs/ /btang snyoms ngo tsha shes khrel yod/ /rtsa ba gnyis rnam mi 'tshe dang/ /brtson 'grus rtag tu dge la 'byung/ /rmongs dang bag med le lo dang/ /ma dad pa dang rmugs dang rgod//
6a5(mdo 'grel): nyon mongs can la rtag tu 'byung/ /mi dge la ni khrel med dang/ /ngo tsha med pa'o khro ba dang/ /khon du 'dzin dang g.yo dang ni/ /phrag dog 'tshig 'chab ser sna dang/ /rgyu dang rgyags dang rnam 'tshe ni/ /nyon mongs chu ngu'i sa pa rnams/ /'dod pa'i dge
6a6(mdo 'grel): ba'i sems la ni/ /rtog dang spyod dang bcas pa'i phyir/ /sems las byung ba nyi shu gnyis/ /la la dag tu 'gyod pas bsnan/ /mi dge ba ni ma 'dres dang/ /lha dang ldan la'ang nyi shu 'byung/ /nyon mongs bzhi dang khro sogs dang/ /'gyod pa dang ni nyi shu
6a7(mdo 'grel): gcig /bsgribs la bco brgyad lung ma bstan/ /gzhan la bcu gnyis dag tu 'dod/ /gnyid ni kun la mi 'gal phyir/ /gang la yod pa des bstan to/ /de la 'gyod gnyid mi dge rnams/ /bsam gtan dang po dag na med/ /rtog pa'ang bsam gtan khyad
6b1(mdo 'grel): par can/ /de yi gong na dpyod pa yang/ /ma gus ngo tsha med khrel med/ /kha na ma tho 'jigs mi lta/ /dga' dang gus nyid ngo tsha shes/ /de gnyis 'dod dang gzugs dag na/ /rtog dang dpyod pa rtsid zhib nyid/ /nga rgyal khengs pa rgyags pa ni/ /rang gi chos la
6b2(mdo 'grel): chags pa yi/ /sems ni yongs su gtugs pa'o/ /sems dang yid dang rnam shes ni/ /don gcig sems dang sems byung dag rten dang dmigs dang rnam bcas dang/ /mtshungs par ldan pa'ang rnam pa lnga/ /mi ldan pa yi 'ang byed rnams/ /thob dang ma thob skal?
6b3(mdo 'grel): mnyam dang/ /'du shes med snyoms 'jug dag dang/ /srog dang mtshan nyid rnams dang ni/ /ming gi tshogs la sags pa yang/ /thob pa rnyed pa ldan pa'o/ /thob dang ma thob rang rgyud du/ /gtogs pa rnams kyi'o 'gog gnyis kyi/ /dus gsum pa yi rnam pa gsum?
6b4(mdo 'grel): dge la sogs kyi dge la sogs/ /der gtogs rnams kyi rang khams pa/ /ma gtogs rnams kyi rnams ni bzhi/ /slob dang mi slob min gyi gsum/ /spang bya min pa'i rnam gnyis 'dod/ /lung bstan min thob lhan cig skye/ /mngon shes sprul pa ma
6b5(mdo 'grel): gtogs pa/ /bsgribs pa'i gzugs kyi'ang 'dod pa na/ /gzugs kyi sngar ni skye ba med/ /ma thob ma bsgribs lung ma bstan/ /'das ma skyes kyi de rnams gsum/ /'dod sogs gtogs dang dri med kyi'ang/ /lam ma thob pa so so yi/ /skye bor 'dod do de
6b6(mdo 'grel): thob dang/ /sa 'phos nas ni rnam nyams 'gyur/ /skal mnyam sems can 'dra pa'o/ /'du shes med pa pa 'du shes/ /med par sems dang sems byung rnams/ /'gog pa'o rnam smin de 'bras che/ /de bzhin 'du shes med snyoms 'jug /bsam gtan tha mar
6b7(mdo 'grel): 'byung 'dod pas/ /dge ba'o skyes nas myong 'gyur nyid/ /'phags pa'i ma yin dus cig thob/ /'gog pa zhes pa'ang de bzhin nyid/ /'di gnas don du srid rtse skyes/ /dge ba'o gnyis su myong 'gyur dang/ /ma nges 'phags pa'i sbyor bas 'thob/ /thub
7a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i byang chub kyis thob byas/ /dang por ma yin skad cig ma/ /sum cu rtsa bzhis 'thob phyir ro/ /gnyis ka 'dod dang gzugs rten can/ /'gog pa dang por mi'i nang du/ /srog ni che yin drod dang ni/ /rnam shes rten gang yin
7a2(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /mtshan nyid dag ni skye ba dang/ /rga dang gnas dang mi rtag nyid/ /de dag skye ba'i skye la sogs/ /de chos brgyad dang gcig la 'jug /rgyu dang rkyen dag med par ni/ /skye bas bskyed bya skyed byed min/ /ming gi tshogs la sogs pa ni/ /ming dang ngag
7a3(mdo 'grel): dang yi ge'i tshogs/ /'dod dang gzugs gtogs sems can ston/ /rgyu mthun lung bstan min de bzhin/ /skal mnyam rnam par smin pa'ang yin/ /khams gsum pa de thob rnam gnyis/ /mtshan nyid rnams kyang snyoms 'jug dang/ /mi ldan pa dag
7a4(mdo 'grel): rgyu mthun pa/ /byed rgyu lhan cig 'byung ba dang/ /skal mnyam mtshungs par ldan pa dang/ /kun tu 'gro dang rnam smin dang/ /rgyu ni rnam pa drug tu 'dod/ /rang las gzhan pa byed rgyu'i rgyu/ /lhan cig 'byung gang phan tshun 'bras/ /'byung bzhin sems kyi rjes
7a5(mdo 'grel): 'jug dang/ /sems dang mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi bzhin/ /sems las byung dang sdom gnyis dang/ /sems dang de dag gi mtshan nyid/ /sems kyi rjes 'jug dus dang ni/ /'bras sogs dge la sogs pas so/ /skal mnyam rgyu ni 'dra ba'o/ /rang sa
7a6(mdo 'grel): ba'o sngar skyes rnams/ /sa dgu'i lam ni phan tshun du/ /mnyam dang khyad par can gyi yin/ /sbyor byung de nyid kho na'i yin/ /thos dang bsam byung la sogs pa/ /mtshungs ldan rgyu ni sems dag dang/ /sems byung rten mtshungs can rnams so/ /kun 'gro zhes
7a7(mdo 'grel): bya nyon mongs can/ /rnams kyi rang sar kun 'gro lnga/ /rnam smin rgyu ni mi dge dang/ /dge ba zag bcas rnams kho na/ /kun 'gro skal mnyam dus gnyis pa/ /gsum po dag ni dus gsum pa/ /'dus byas bral bcas 'bras bu yin/ /'dus ma byas
7b1(mdo 'grel): la de dag med/ /rnam smin 'bras bu tha ma'i yin/ /bdag po'i 'bras bu dang po'i yin/ /rgyu mthun skal mnyam kun 'gro ba'i/ /skyes bu pa ni gnyis gyi yin/ /rnam smin lung du ma bstan chos/ /sems can brjod lung bstan phyis 'byung/ /rgyu mthun rgyu dang
7b2(mdo 'grel): 'dra ba'o/ /bral ba blo yis zad pa'o/ /gang gi stobs kyis gang skyes pa'i/ /'bras de skyes bu byed las skyes/ /sngon byung ma yin 'dus byas ni/ /'dus byas kho na'i bdag po'i 'bras/ /lnga po da ltar 'bras bu 'dzin/ /gnyis ni rab tu 'byin par
7b3(mdo 'grel): byed/ /da ltar gyi dang 'das ba dag /gcig ni 'das pas 'byin par 'gyur/ /nyon mongs can dang rnam smin skyes/ /lhag dang dang por 'phags rim bzhin/ rnam smin kun 'gro de gnyis dang/ /skal mnyam ma gtogs lhag las skye/ /sems dang sems
7b4(mdo 'grel): las byung ba yin/ /mtshungs ldan ma gtogs gzhan de bzhin/ /rkyen ni bzhi po dag tu gsungs/ /rgyu zhes bya ba rgyu lnga yin/ /sems dang sems byung skyes pa rnams/ /tha ma min mtshungs de ma thag /dmigs pa chos rnams thams cad do/ /byed rgyu zhes
7b5(mdo 'grel): byar bdag por bshad/ /rgyu gnyis po dag 'gag pa las/ /bya ba byed do gsum po ni/ /skye la'o de las gzhan pa yi/ /rkyen dag de las bzlog pa yin/ /bzhi yi sems dang sems byung rnams/ /gsum gyis snyoms par 'jug pa gnyis/ /gzhan ni
7b6(mdo 'grel): gnyis po dag las skyes/ /dbang phyug sogs min rim sogs phyir/ /de'i rgyu 'byung ba rnam pa gnyis/ /'byung las gyur pa'i rnam pa lnga/ /'byung gyur rnam gsum phan tshun du/ /'byung ba rnams kyi de rnams gcig /'dod yid dge dang mi dge dang/ /sgrib pa dang ni
7b7(mdo 'grel): ma bsgribs pa/ /gzugs dang gzugs med pa dag na/ /mi dge las gzhan zag med gnyis/ /'dod sems dge ba las sems dgu/ /de ni brgyad po kho na las/ /mi dge ba ni bcu dag las/ /de las bzhi ste bsgribs de bzhin/ /ma bsgribs pa ni lnga dag
8a1(mdo 'grel): las/ /de las 'jug thogs sems bdun no/ /gzugs na dge las bcu gcig go /de ni dgu ni 'jug thogs su/ /bsgribs pa brgyad las drug las drug /ma bsgribs pa ni gsum las so/ /de las drug ste gzugs med pa'ang/
8a2(mdo 'grel): de yi tshul la dge ba las/ /sems dgu dag go de drug gi/ bsgribs pa las bdun de de bzhin/ /slob pa bzhi las de las lnga/ /mi slob pa ni lnga las so/ /de las sems ni bzhi dag go /bcu gnyis de dag nyi shur yang/ /gsum du skyes nas
8a3(mdo 'grel): thob pa dang/ /sbyor byung dge rnam gnyis phyi nas/ /rnam smin skyes dang spyod lam pa/ /bzo yi gnas dang sprul pa dang/ /'dod na lung bstan min rnam bzhir/ /gzugs na bzo ma gtogs pa'o/ /khams gsum pa yi nyon mongs can/ /drug dang drug
8a4(mdo 'grel): dang gnyis rnyed do/ /gzugs skyes dge la gsum dag go /slob pa la bzhi lhag la de/ /chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi tshig le'ur byas pa las dbang po bstan pa zhes bya ba ste gnas gnyis pa'o// //dmyal ba yi dags dud 'gro dang/ /mi rnams
8a5(mdo 'grel): dang ni lha drug dag /'dod pa'i khams yin dmyal ba dang/ /gling dbye ba las de nyi shu/ /gong ma'i gnas dag bcu bdun ni/ /gzugs khams yin deng so so yi/ /bsam gtan sa ni gsum pa yin/ /bzhi pa sa ni brgyad pa yin/ /gzugs med khams
8a6(mdo 'grel): na gnas med do/ /skye ba las ni rnam pa bzhi/ /der ni ris dang srog la yang/ /sems kyi rgyud ni brten pa yin/ /der ni dmyal sogs 'gro ba lnga/ /rang gi ming gis bstan de dag /nyon mongs can min lung bstan min/ /sems can zhes bya bar srid min/ /lus
8a7(mdo 'grel): dang 'du shes tha dad dang/ /lus tha dad cing 'du shes gcig /bzlog dang lus dang 'du shes gcig /gzugs can ma yin gsum po dag /rnam shes gnas pa bdun lhag ma/ /de 'joms byed ldan srid rtse dang/ /'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams//
8b1(mdo 'grel): sems can gyi ni gnas dgur bshad/ /mi 'dod bzhin gnas phyir gzhan min/ /gnas pa dag ni yang bzhi ste/ /zag dang bcas pa'i phung po bzhi/ /rang gis pa nyid rnam shes/ /'ba' zhig gnas par ma bshad do/ /bsdu na mu ni bzhi yin no/ /der ni skor las
8b2(mdo 'grel): skyes sogs/ /sems can skye gnas bzhi dag tu/ /mi dang dud 'gro rnam pa bzhi/ /dmyal ba rnams dang lha rnams dang/ /srid pa bar ma rdzus te skye/ /yi dags mngal na skye ba'ang yin/ /'dir gang 'chi dang skye ba yi/ /srid pa'i bar du 'byung ba'o/ /bgrod pa'i yul du ma phyin
8b3(mdo 'grel): phyir/ /srid pa bar ma byung ba min/ /'bru yi rgyun dang chos mthun phyir/ /srid pa chad las 'byung ba min/ /gzugs brnyan ma grub phyir pa dang/ /mi 'dra'i phyir na dpe ma yin/ /gcig ni lhan cig gnyis med phyir/ /rgyun min phyir gnyis las 'byung phyir/ /ma gur nas
8b4(mdo 'grel): gsungs phyir yod dri za/ /sngar gsung 'gro mdo las kyang grub/ /de ni 'phen pa gcig pa'i phyir/ /sngon dus srid 'byung sha tshugs can/ /de ni 'chi ba'i sngon rol te/ /skye ba'i skad cig phan chad do/ /rigs mthun lha mig dag pas mthong/ /las kyi rdzu 'phrul
8b5(mdo 'grel): shugs dang ldan/ /dbang po kun tshad thogs med ldan/ /mi zlog de ni dri za'o/ /blo ni phyin ci log gyur pas/ /rtse dags 'gro ba'i yul du 'gro/ /dri dang gnas la mngon 'dod gzhan/ /dmyal ba yi ni spyi'u tshugs yin/ /gcig ni shes bzhin du 'jug go/
8b6(mdo 'grel): gzhan ni gnas pa yang gzhan ni/ /'byung ba'ang gzhan ni thams cad rmongs/ /sgong las skyes rtag tu'o/ /mngal du 'jug pa gsum dag ste/ /'khor los sgyur dang rang byung gnyis/ /las sam ye shes sam gnyis ka/ rgya cha'i phyir na go rims bzhin//
8b7(mdo 'grel): bdag med phung po tsam nyid do/ /nyon mongs las kyis mngon 'dus byas/ /srid pa bar ma'i rgyun gyis na/ /mar me bzhin du mngal du 'gro/ /ji ltar phangs bzhin rim gyi rgyun/ /skyes nas las dang nyon mongs kyis/ /'jig rten pha rol dag tu 'gro/ /srid pa'i
9a1(mdo 'grel): 'khor lo thog ma med/ /de ni rten cing 'brel 'byung ba'i/ /yan lag bcu gnyis cha gsum mo/ /sngon dang phyi mthar gnyis gnyis dang/ /bar du brgyad yongs rdzogs ldan la/ /ma rig nyon mongs sngon gnas skabs/ /'du byed
9a2(mdo 'grel): dag ni sngon las kyi/ /rnam shes mtshams sbyor phung po yin/ /ming dang gzugs ni de phan chad/ /skye mched drug dod tshun chad do/ /de ni gsum 'dus tshun chad do/ /reg pa bde sdug la sogs kyi/ /rgyu shes nus pa tshun chad do/ /tshor 'khrig tshun chad
9a3(mdo 'grel): sred pa ni/ /longs spyod 'khrig pa chags can gyi/ /nye bar len pa longs spyod rnams/ /thob par bya phyir yongs rgyug pa'i/ /de srid 'bras bu 'byung 'gyur ba'i/ /las byed de ni srid pa yin/ /nying mtshams sbyor ba skye ba yin/ /tshor ba'i bar ni rga shi
9a4(mdo 'grel): yin/ /'di ni gnas skabs par 'dod do/ /gtso bo'i phyir na yan lag bsgrags/ /sngon dang phyi mdza' bar dag la/ /rmongs pa rnam par bzlog phyir ro/ /nyon mongs gsum mo las gnyis so/ /gzhan bdun de bzhin 'bras bu yin/ /gnyis kyi rgyu
9a5(mdo 'grel): 'bras mdor bsdus pa/ /bar ma'i rjes su dpag pa las/ /nyon mongs pa las nyon mongs dang/ /bya ba nyid do de las gzhi/ /de las gzhi dang nyon mongs skye/ /'di ni srid pa'i yan lag lugs/ /'dir ni 'byung ba rgyu yin te/ /byung ba 'bras bu yin
9a6(mdo 'grel): par 'dod/ /rig pa'i mi mthun phyogs chos gzhan/ /ma rig mi mdza' brdzun sogs bzhin/ /kun sbyor sogs tshig phyir gal te/ /shes rab ngan pa'o min lta phyir/ /lta ba de dag mtshungs ldan phyir/ /shes rab nyon mongs bstan phyir ro/ /ming ni gzugs
9a7(mdo 'grel): can ming phung po/ /reg drug 'dus te byung ba yin/ /lnga ni thogs pa'i reg pa yin/ /drug pa bla dags tshig ces bya/ /rig dang ma rig dang gzhan reg/ dri med nyon mongs can lhag ma/ /gnod sems rjes su chags pa'i reg/ bde ba myong gyur la sogs
9b1(mdo 'grel): gsum/ /de las byung ba'i tshor ba drug/ lnga ni lus kyi'o sems kyi gzhan/ /de nyid nye bar rgyu ba las/ /rnam pa dag ni yang bco brgyad/ /'dod na thams cad rang dmigs can/ /spyod yul gzugs can bcu gnyis so/ /gong ma gsum gyi bsam gtan ni/ /gnyis na bcu
9b2(mdo 'grel): gnyis 'dod 'gro rnams/ /rang la dmigs brgyad gzugs med pa/ /gnyis kyi'o bsam gtan gnyis na drug /drug gi 'dod pa'o rang ni bzhi'i/ /gong ma gcig gi dmigs pa yin/ /gzugs med nye bar bsdogs na bzhi/ /gzugs 'gro gong mar 'gro ba gcig /dngos
9b3(mdo 'grel): gzhin gcig rang yul can/ /bco brgyad thams cad zag dang bcas/ /bshad dang 'chang par 'gyur ba gzhan/ /'dir ni nyon mongs sa bon bzhin/ /klu bzhin rtsa bzhin ljon shing bzhin/ /de bzhin shun pa bzhin du 'dod/ /las ni shun bcas 'bras dang 'dra/ /
9b4(mdo 'grel): de bzhin sman dang me zhag bzhin/ /bzhi ni bza' btung grub pa bzhin/ /srid pa bzhi po de dag las/ /skye ba'i srid pa nyon mongs can/ /rang gi sa pa'i nyon mongs kun/ /gzhan rnams gsum mo gzugs med gsum/ /'gro ba zas kyis gnas pa yin/ /kham gyi zas
9b5(mdo 'grel): ni 'dod pa na/ /skye mched gsum gyi bdag nyid do/ /gzugs kyi skye mched ma yin des/ /rang dbang grol la mi phan phyir/ /reg dang sems dpa' rnam shes ni/ /zag bcas zas yin gsum dag ni/ /yid la byung dang srid tshol dang/ dri za srid pa bar ma dang//
9b6(mdo 'grel): 'grub pa'o 'di la gnas dang ni/ /bsten pa rgyas pa'i don du gnyis/ /srid gzhan 'phen dang 'grub pa yi/ /don du gnyis te go rims bzhin/ chad dang mtshams sbyor 'dod chags 'bral/ /nyams dang 'chi 'pho skye ba rnams/ /yid kyi rnam shes kho nar 'dod//
9b7(mdo 'grel): 'chi 'pho skye ba btang snyoms la/ /rtse gcig sems med la de med/ /mya ngan 'da' lung bstan min gnyis/ /'og min ltar 'gro mi skye rnams/ /rim gyis 'chi na rkang pa dang/ /lte ba snying gar yid 'chi 'pho/ /gnad gcod pa ni chu sogs kyis/ /'phags
10a1(mdo 'grel): dang mtshams med byed ba dag /yang dag log ba nyid du nges/ /de la snod kyi 'jig rten gyi/ /gnas par 'dod pa'i 'og dag gi /rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams su ni/ /sa ya drug 'bum grangs med do/ /chu rngams 'bum phrag bcu gcig
10a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ /stong phrag dag ni nyi shu'o/ /phyis ni rngams su 'bum phrag brgyad/ /lhag ma dag ni gser du 'gyur/ /chu dang gser gyi dkyil 'khor gyi/ /thad kar 'bum phrag bcu gnyis dang/ /stong phrag gsum dang brgya phrag ni/ /phyed dang lnga rnams kho na'o/ /khor yug tu ni
10a3(mdo 'grel): sum 'gyur ro/ /de la lhun po gnya' shing 'dzin/ /gshol mda''dzin dang seng ldeng can/ /de bzhin lta na sdug? ri dang/ /rta rna dang ni rnam 'dud dang/ /mu khyud 'dzin ri'o? de nas ni/ /gling rnams yin no de dag gi /phyi rol na ni khor yug ste/ /bdun ni gser
10a4(mdo 'grel): yin de lcags so/ /lhun po rin chen bzhi'i rang bzhin/ /chu yi nang du brgyad khri dag /nub po de bzhin steng du yang/ /dpag tshad dag ni brgyad khri'o/ /brgyad po'i 'phang du phyed phyed dbri/ /de dag rngams suAng 'phang dang mnyam/ /de dag par bdun ral mtsho
10a5(mdo 'grel): yin/ /dang po stong phrag brgyad cu'o/ /de ni nang gi rgya mtsho yin/ /de yi ngos la sum 'gyur ro/ /rol mtsho gzhan ni phyed phyed bri/ lhag ma phye yi mtsho chen yin/ /'bum phrag gsum dang stong phrag ni/ /nyi shu gnyis po de la ni/ /'dzam bu'i gling ste ngos gsum
10a6(mdo 'grel): la/ /stong phrag gnyis so shing rta'i dbyibs/ /gcig la dpag tshad phyed dang bzhi/ /shar gyi lus 'phags zla gam 'dra/ /ngos gsum 'di dag 'dra gcig la/ /dpag tshad sum brgya lnga bcu'o/ /ba lang spyod gling zlum po ste/ /stong phrag phye dang brgyad yin no//
10a7(mdo 'grel): de'i dbus stong phrag phye dang gsum/ /sgra mi snyan brgyad gru bzhir mnyam/ /de yi bar gyi gling brgyad ni/ /lus dang lus 'phags sgra mi snyan/ /sgra mi snyan gyi zla dang ni/ /rnga yab dang ni rnga yab gzhan/ /g.yo ldan dang ni lam mchog 'gro/ /'di nas byang du ri
10b1(mdo 'grel): nag po/ /dgu 'das gangs ri'i de nas ni/ /spos ngad ldan pa'i chu rol na/ /chu zheng lnga bcu yod pa'i mtsho/ /'di 'og stong phrag nyi shu na/ /mnar med pa'o de tsam mo/ /de yi steng na dmyal ba bdun/ /brgyad po kun la lhag bcu drug /de dag gi ni ngos bzhin/ /me
10b2(mdo 'grel): mar mur dang ro myags dang/ /spu gri lam sogs chu bo yin/ /chu bur can sogs grang brgyad gzhan/ /nyi zla lhun po'i phyed na'o/ /dpag tshad lnga bcu gcig dang bcas/ /nam phyed nyi ma nub pa dang/ /nyi ma phyed dang 'char dus gcig/ dbyar gyi zla ba gnyis pa yi/ /
10b3(mdo 'grel): tha ma'i tshes dbu nas mtshan ring/ /dgun rnams kyi ni bzhi pa la/ /thung ngu 'gyur ro nyin mo ldog/ nyin mtshan ring ba thang cig go /nyi ma lho byang 'gro tshe'o/ /nyi ma dang ni nye ba las/ /rang gi grib mas 'grib par snang/ /'di la bang rim bzhi yod de/ /bar gyi
10b4(mdo 'grel): thag ni stong phrag bcu/ /stong phrag dag ni bcu drug dang/ /brgyad dang bzhi dang gnyis 'phags so/ /de la lag na gzhong thogs dang/ /phreng thogs dang ni rtag myos dang/ /rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams gnas/ /ri ni bdun po dag la yang/ /lhun po'i rtse na
10b5(mdo 'grel): sum cu gsum/ /de yi ngos la brgyad khri'o/ /phyogs mtshams brtsegs pa bzhi la ni/ /lag na rdo rje gnas dbus na/ /grong khyer lta na sdug ces pa/ /ngos la nyis stong lnga brgya pa/ /dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis gser gyi/ /rang bzhin bzhi bkra mnyen pa
10b6(mdo 'grel): yod/ /de na rnam par rgyal byed de/ /ngos la nyis brgya lnga bcu'o/ /phyi rol shing rta sna tshogs dang/ /rtsub 'gyur 'dres tshal dga' bas brgyan/ /de dag gi ni phyogs bzhi na/ /nyi shus bshad nas gzhi bzang/ /byang shar mtshams na yongs 'du ste/ /
10b7(mdo 'grel): lho nub mtshams na chos bzang ngo/ /de steng lha rnams gzhal med khang/ /'dod pa spyod pa drug yin no/ /gnyis gnyis 'khyud dang lag bcangs dang/ /rgod dang bltas pas 'khrig pa yin/ /byis pa lo lnga lon pa nas/ /lo bcu lon pa lta bu'i bar//
11a1(mdo 'grel): de dag tu skye gzugs can rnams/ /kun rdzob gos dang bcas pa nyid/ /'dod pa skye ba gsum ba ni/ /'dod pa'i lha dang mir bcas rnams/ /bde ba skye pa gsum po ni/ /bsam gtan gsum la sa dgu yin/ /gnas nas gnas
11a2(mdo 'grel): 'og ji snyed ba/ /de nas de yi gong de srid/ /rdzu 'phrul gzhan rten ma gtogs pa/ /de dag gong ma mthong ba med/ /gling bzhi pa dang nyi zla dang/ /ri rab dang ni 'dod lha dang/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong la ni/ /steng ni spyi phud yin par 'dod/ /de stong la
11a3(mdo 'grel): ni stong gnyis pa/ /bar ma'i 'jig rten khams yin no/ /de stong la ni stong gsum mo/ /mnyam du 'jig cing 'byung ba yin/ /'dzam bu'i gling pa rnams kyi chad/ /khru bzhi pa dang phyed dang bzhi/ /shar dang ba lang spyod dang ni/ /byang zhes bya ba nyis
11a4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur bskyed/ /'dod dang ldan pa'i lha yi lus/ /bzhi cha nas ni rgyang grags dag/ phyed dang gnyis kyi bar du bskyed/ /gzugs can dang po dpag tshad phyed/ /de yi gong ma phyed phyed bskyed/ /'od chung rnams kyi lhag yan chad/ /lus ni nyis 'gyur
11a5(mdo 'grel): nyis 'gyur te/ /sprin med dpag tshad gsum 'dor ro/ /sgra mi snyan na tshe stong ste/ /gnyis na phyed phyed spangs pa'o/ /'di na ma ngas tha mar ni/ /lo bcu dang po dpag tu med/ /mi rnams kyi lo lnga bcu la/ /'dod pa dag gi lha rnams las/ /'og ma dag gi nyin
11a6(mdo 'grel): zhag gcig /des na tshe lo lnga brgya'o/ /gong ma gnyis gnyis 'gyur ro/ /gzugs can nyin mtshan med tshe ni/ /rang lus gzhal pa'i bskal pa yis/ /gzugs med bskal pa stong phrag ni nyi shus lhag pas lhag pas yin/ 'od chung nas bzung bskal
11a7(mdo 'grel): tshan te/ /de yi 'og ma phyed yin no/ /yang sos la sogs drug rim bzhin/ /'dod lha'i tshe dang nyin zhag mnyam/ /des na de dag rnams kyi tshe/ /'dod pa'i lha dang 'dra ba yin/ /rab tu cha phyed mnar med ni/ /bar gyi bskal pa'i dud 'gro rnams/ /mchog
11b1(mdo 'grel): ring bskal pa'o yi dags rnams/ /zla ba nyin zhag gi lnga brgya/ /til rdzangs nang nas lo brgya zhing/ /til gcig phyang pas zad gyur pa/ /chung? ba can gyi tshe yin te/ /gzhan gyi tshe ni nyi shus bsgyur/ /sgra mi snyan ma gtogs par 'chi/ /gzugs ming dus mdza' /
11b2(mdo 'grel): rdul yig dang/ /skad cig phra rabs rdul dang ni/ /rdul phran dang ni de bzhin du/ /lcags chu ri bong lug dang glang/ /nyi zer rdul dang so ma dang/ /de las byung dang de bzhin du/ /sor tshigs shes bya gong bdun 'gyur/ /sor mo nyi shu bzhi la khyu/ /khru bzhi la
11b3(mdo 'grel): ni gzhu gang ngo/ /de dag lnga brgya rnams la ni/ /rgyang grags de la dgon par 'dod/ /de brgyad dpag tshad ces bya'o/ /skad cig ma brgya nyi shu la/ /de yi skad cig de dag kyang/ /drug cu la ni thang cig go /yud tsam nyin zhag zla gsum ni/ /gong nas gong du sum cu
11b4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /zhag mi thub dang bcas pa ni/ /zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig /bskal pa rnam pa mang bshad pa/ /'jig pa'i bskal pa dmyal ba yi/ /srid pa med nas snod zad pa/ /'chags pa dang po'i rlung nas ni/ /dmyal ba'i srid pa'i bar du'o/ /par gyi
11b5(mdo 'grel): bskal pa dpag med nas/ /tshe lo bcu pa'i bar du'o/ /de nas yar skye mar 'bri ba'i/ /bskal pa gzhan gyi bco brgyad dang/ /yar skye ba ni gcig yin te/ /de dag tshe ni brgyad khri'i bar/ /de ltar 'jig rten 'chags pa 'di/ /bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur gnas
11b6(mdo 'grel): 'chags pa dang ni 'jig pa dang/ /zhig nas 'dug pa dag mnyam mo/ /de dag brgyad cu la bskal chen/ /de grangs med gsum la sangs rgyas /'byung ngo mar ni 'grib pa yi/ /brgya yi bar la de dag 'byung/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams gnyis ka la/
11b7(mdo 'grel): bse ru bskal brgya yis rgyus/ /'khor los sgyur pa 'byung ba ni/ /stong phrag brgyud cu las mi phyi/ /gser dngul zangs lcags 'khor lo can/ /de dag gling gcig gling gnyis dang/ /gsum dang bzhi la mas rim bzhin/ /lhan cig gnyis
12a1(mdo 'grel): min sangs rgyas bzhin/ /phas bsu rang 'gro g.yul bshams dang/ /mtshon brtsems pas rgyal gnod pa med/ /thub mtshan yul na gnas pa dang/ /gsal la rdzogs pas 'phags pa yin/ /sngar byung sems can gzugs
12a2(mdo 'grel): can bzhin/ /de nas rim gyis rol chags/ /le los bsogs 'jog byas nas ni/ /'dzin bcas rnams kyis zhing dpon bstabs/ /de nas las kyi lam lhag pas/ /tshe thung lo ni bcu yin no/ /bskal pa mtshon dang nad dang ni/ /mu ge dag gis
12a3(mdo 'grel): tshar phyin to/ /zhag rnam dang ni zla ba dang/ /lo bdun dag tu go rim bzhin/ /me dang chu dang rlung dag gis/ /'jig pa dag ni yang gsum yin/ /bsam gtan gnyis sogs gsum po ni/ /de dag gi rtse go rims bzhin/ /de yi skyon dang chos mthun phyir//
12a4(mdo 'grel): bzhi pa na med mi g.yo'i phyir/ /mi rtag de yi gzhal med khang/ /sems can bcas te 'byung 'jig phyir/ /me yis bdun na chu yis gcig /de ltar chu bdun thal nas kyang/ /me yis bdun no de nas kyang/ /mjug tu rung gis 'jig pa min/ /
12a5(mdo 'grel): chos mngon pa mdzod kyi tshig le'ur byas pa las 'jig rten pa bstan pa zhes bya ba ste gnas gsum pa'o// //las las 'jig rten sna tshogs skyes/ /de ni sems pa dang des byas/ /sems pa yid kyi las yin no/ /des skyes lus
12a6(mdo 'grel): dang dag gi las/ /de dag rnam rig rnam rig min/ /lus rnam rig byed dbyibs su 'dod/ /'gro min gang phyir 'dus byas ni/ /skad cig pa yin 'jig phyir ro/ /rgyu med pa las 'ga' mi 'byung/ /rgyu yang 'jig pa por 'gyur ro/ /gnyis gzung 'gyur
12a7(mdo 'grel): de rdul la med/ /dag rnam rig byed ni ngag sgra/ /rnam gsum dri med gzugs gsungs dang/ /'phel dang ma byas lam sogs phyir/ /'dod gtogs rnam rig min skad cig/ phyin chad 'das pa'i 'byung las skye/ /zag bcas lus dang ngag gi las//
12b1(mdo 'grel): rang gi 'byung ba dag rgyur byas/ zag med gang du skyes pa yin/ /rnam rig byed min ma zin dang/ /rgyu mthun las byung sems can ston/ /rgyu mthun zin pa'i 'byung las skye/ /ting 'dzin skyes 'byung ma zin dang/ /rgyas byung tha dad min las skye/ /rnam rig min lung
12b2(mdo 'grel): bstan min med/ /gzhan ni rnam gsum mi dge ni/ /'dod na gzugs na'ang rnam rig min/ /rnam rig dpyod dang bcas dag na/ /'dod pa na yang bsgribs pa med/ /gang phyir kun slong me thar pa/ /dam pa'i don du dge rtsa ba/ /ngo tsha khrel yod bdag nyid kyis/ /de
12b3(mdo 'grel): dag dang ldan mtshungs ldan gyis/ /byas ba la sogs kun slong bas/ /bzlog pa mi dge don dam par/ /lung ma bsten pa bsten pa dag/ kun slong rnam gnyis rgyu dang ni/ /de yi dus kyi slong zhes bya/ /gnyis las dang po rab 'jug byed/ /gnyis pa rjes su 'jug
12b4(mdo 'grel): byed yin/ /mthong bas spang bya'i rnam shes ni/ /rab tu 'jug byed yin yid ni/ /bsgom pas sngar bya gnyis ka yin/ /lnga na des su 'jug byed yin/ /rab tu 'jug byed dge sogs las/ /rjes 'jug byed kyang rnam gsum 'gyur/ /thub pa'i 'dra ba 'am
12b5(mdo 'grel): de dge ba/ /rnam smin las skyes gnyis ka min/ /rnam rig min rnam gsum zhes bya/ /sdom dang sdom pa min dang gzhan/ /sdom pa so sor thar ces bya/ /de bzhin zag med bsam gtan skyes/ /so sor thar ces bya rnam brgyad/ /rdzas su rnam pa bzhi yin no/ /mtshan
12b6(mdo 'grel): las ming ni 'pho ba'i phyir/ /tha dad de dag 'gal ba med/ /spang bya lnga brgyad cu dang ni/ /thams cad spong ba mnos pa las/ /dge bsnyen dang ni bsnyen gnas dang/ /dge tshul tshad dang dge slong nyid/ /tshul khrims dang ni legs spyad dang/ /las dang sdom pa
12b7(mdo 'grel): zhes bya'o/ /dang po'i rnam rig rnam rig min/ /so sor thar dang bya ba'i lam/ /so sor thar dang ldan pa brgyad/ /bsam gtan skye dang de ldan pa/ /zag med 'phags pa'i sems can dang/ /tha ma gnyis ni sems rjes 'brang/ /bar chad med lam
13a1(mdo 'grel): skyes de gnyis/ /mi lcogs med la spong zhes bya/ /shes bzhin dang ni dran dag gnyis/ /yid dang dbang po sdom pa yin/ /so sor thar gnas ji srid du/ /ma btang bar brtag da ltar gyi/ /rnam rig mi ldan skad cig
13a2(mdo 'grel): ma/ /dang po phyin chad 'das pa dang/ /sdom min gnas pa'ang de dang 'dra/ /bsam gtan sdom dang ldan pa ni/ /rtag tu 'das dang ma 'ongs dang/ /'phags ni dang po 'das dang min/ /mnyam gzhag 'phags lam gnas de gnyis/ /
13a3(mdo 'grel): da ltar dang ldan par gnas la/ /yod na dang po bar gyi dang/ /phyin chad dus ni gnyis dang ngo/ /sngon min gnas pa dge ba dang/ /sdom la gnas pa mi dge ba'i/ /rnam rig min ldan ji srid du/ /rab dang nyon mongs shugs ldan par/ /rnam rig byed ni thams cad
13a4(mdo 'grel): la/ /byed pa dag la da ltar ldan/ /ma btang bar du skad cig ma/ /phyin chad 'das ldan ma 'ongs med/ /bsgribs pa dang ni ma bsgribs pa/ /'das pa dag dang ldan pa'ang med/ /sdom pa min dang nyes spyad dang/ /'chal pa'i tshul
13a5(mdo 'grel): khrims las de'i lam/ /bar ma dor gnas sems gzhan pas/ /byed na rnam rig nyid dang ldan/ /rnam rig btang dang ma skyes pa'i/ /'phags pa'i gang zag rnam rig min/ /bsam gtan las skyes bsam gtan gyi/ /sa nyid kyis
13a6(mdo 'grel): thob zag med ni/ /'phags des so sor thar ces pa/ /gzhan gyi rnam rig byed sogs kyis/ /ji srid 'tsho dang nyin zhag tu/ /sdom pa yang dag blang bar bya/ /nyin zhag pa yi sdom min med/ /de de ltar nod med ces grag /dma' bar 'dug smras
13a7(mdo 'grel): bzlas pa yis/ /mi brgyan nam ni nangs bar du/ /bsnyen gnas yan lag tshang bar ni/ /nad par gzhan las nod par bya/ /tshul khrims yan lag bag yod pa'i/ /yan lag brtul zhugs yan lag ste/ /bzhi gcig de bzhin gsum rim
13b1(mdo 'grel): bzhin/ /de yis dran nyams dregs par 'gyur/ /gzhan la'ang bsnyen gnas yod mod kyi/ /skyabs su ma song ba la med/ /dge bsnyen nyid du khas blangs pas/ /sdom pa bstan pa dge slong bzhin/ /gal te thams cad bsdams yin na/ /sna gcig spyod
13b2(mdo 'grel): sogs ji lta bu/ /de bsrung ba la gsungs shes grag /chung ngu la sogs yid ji bzhin/ /gang zhig gsum la skyabs 'gro de/ /sangs rgyas dge 'dun byed pa'i chos/ /mi slob pa dang gnyis ka dang/ /mya ngan 'das la skyabs su 'gro/ /log g.yem shin tu smad
13b3(mdo 'grel): phyir dang/ /sla phyir mi byed thob phyir ro/ /sdom pa ji ltar khas blangs bzhin/ /'thob kyi rgyud las ma yin no/ /bslab pa thams cad 'das gyur na/ /brdzun du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir/ /bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba/ /myos 'gyur las gzhan bsrung phyir ro//
13b4(mdo 'grel): 'dod gtogs thams cad gnyis ka dang/ /da ltar dag las 'thob par 'gyur/ /bsam gtan zag med sdom pa ni/ /dngos dang dus ni thams cad las/ /sdom pa sems can thams cad las/ /yan lag rgyu la dbye ba yod/ /sdom pa min pa
13b5(mdo 'grel): thams cad dang/ /yan lag kun las rgyus min no/ /sdom pa min pa bya ba 'am/ /khas len pa las thob par 'gyur/ /lhag ma'i rnam rig min zhing dang/ /len dang gus par byed pas 'thob/ /bslab pa phul dang shi 'phos dang/ /mtshan gnyis
13b6(mdo 'grel): dag ni byung ba dang/ /rtsa ba chad dang mtshan 'das las/ /so sor thar pa'i 'dul ba gtong/ /kha gcig ltung bar 'gyur las smra/ /gzhan dag dam chos nub pa las/ /kha che rnams ni byung ba la/ /bu lon nor bzhin gnyis su 'dod/ /bsam gtan
13b7(mdo 'grel): gtogs pa'i dge ba ni/ /sa 'phos nyams pa dag gis gtod/ /de bzhin gzugs med gtogs 'phags pa/ /'bras bu thob sbyangs nyams pa las/ /sdom min sdom pa thob pa dang/ /shi dang mtshan gnyis byung ba las/ /bar ma shugs
14a1(mdo 'grel): blangs bya ba dang/ /don tshe rtsa ba chad pa las/ /'dod gtogs dge ba gzugs min ni/ /rtsa chad gong du skyes pa las/ /nyon mongs pa can gzugs min ni/ /gnyen po skyes pas rnam nyams 'gyur/ /za ma ma ning sgra mi
14a2(mdo 'grel): snyan/ /mtshan gnyis ma gtogs mi rnams la/ /sdom min sdom pa'ang de bzhin la/ /lha la'ang mi rnams la gsum pa/ /'dod dang gzugs skyes lha rnams la/ /bsam gtan skyes yod zag med ni/ /bsam gtan khyad par 'du shes med/ /
14a3(mdo 'grel): sems can ma gtogs gzugs med na'ang/ /las bde mi bde dang gzhan ni/ /dge dang mi dge dang gzhan yin/ /bsod nams bsod nams min mi g.yo/ /bde ba myong 'gyur la sogs gsum/ /bsod nams 'dod khams dge ba'i las/ /
14a4(mdo 'grel): mi g.yo gong ma las skyes pa'i/ /gang phyir sa ni de dag tu/ /las rnam smin phyir mi g.yo'i phyir/ /bsam gtan gsum pa'i bar dge ba/ /bde ba myong 'gyur de yan chad/ /sdug min bde min myong 'gyur pa/ /sdug bsngal myong 'gyur 'di mi dge/ /'og
14a5(mdo 'grel): na'ang bar ma yod do zhes/ /kha cig zer te gang gi phyir/ /bsam gtan khyad par rnam smin las/ /snga phyi med gsum smin 'dod phyir/ /ngo bo nyid dang mtshungs ldan dang/ /dmigs pa dang ni rnam smin dang/ /mngon sum du ni gyur pa las/ /myong gyur rnam pa
14a6(mdo 'grel): lnga yin no/ /de yang des dang ma nges pa/ /mthong ba'i chos la sogs pa la/ /myong 'gyur phyir na des rnam gsum/ /kha cig las rnams lnga zhes zer/ /gzhan dag mu ni bzhi zhes zer/ /gsum gyis ris ni 'phen par byed/ /thams cad na ni
14a7(mdo 'grel): 'phen pa bzhi/ /dmyal ba na ni dge ba'i gsum/ /gang las 'dod chags bral brtan pa'i/ /byis pa der skyes myong mi byed/ /'phags pa gzhan duAng myong mi byed/ /'dod rtse'i mi brtan pa yang min/ /srid pa bar ma 'dod khams su/ /'phen pa
14b1(mdo 'grel): rnam pa nyi shu gnyis/ /de ni mthong chos 'bras bu yin/ /de ni ris gcig kho na yin/ /nyon mongs rab dang drag po dang/ /yon tan zhing dang rgyun chags su/ /byas pa gang zhig yin pa dang/ /pha ma gsod dang de nges so/ /mthong chos 'bras bu can gyi las//
14b2(mdo 'grel): zhing dang bsam pa'i khyad par las/ /sa de'i 'dod chags gtan bral phyir/ /rnam smin nges par gang yin pa'o/ /gang dag 'gog byams nyon mongs med/ /mthong dang dgra bcom 'bras langs pa/ /de la phan gnod byas pa yi/ /'bras bu 'phral du
14b3(mdo 'grel): myong bar 'gyur/ /rnam par rtog pa med pa yi/ /dge ba'i las ni rnam smin ni/ /sems kyi tshor ba kho nar 'dod/ /mi dge ba ni lus kyi yin/ /g.yengs pa'i sems ni yid sems pa/ /de ni las kyi rnam smin skyes/ /skrag gnod ma mnyam mya ngan gyis/ /
14b4(mdo 'grel): sgra mi snyan min 'dod ldan rnams/ /yon skyon snyigs mar gsungs pa ni/ /g.yo ang zhe sdang 'dod chags skyes/ /dkar nag la sogs bye brag gis/ /las ni rnam pa bzhi yin no/ /mi dge gzugs dang 'dod gtogs pa'i/ /dge ba nyid ni rim bzhin
14b5(mdo 'grel): du/ /gnag dang dkar dang gnyis ka'i las/ /de zad byed pa zag med yin/ /chos bzod 'dod chags 'bral ba yi/ /bar chad med lam brgyad kyi gang/ /sems pa rnam pa bcu gnyis de/ /nag po zad par byed pa'i las/ /dgu pa'i sems pa gang
14b6(mdo 'grel): yin pa/ /de ni dkar nag zad byed yin/ /dkar po bsam gtan chags 'bral ba'i/ /bar chad med lam skyes tha mas/ /gzhan ni dmyal ba myong 'gyur dang/ /'dod gzhan myong 'gyur gnyis su rig /gzhan ni mthong bas spang bya gnag /'dod pa las skyes
14b7(mdo 'grel): gzhan dkar nag /mi slob lus ngag las yid nyid/ /thub pa'i gsum ste go rims bzhin/ /legs dpyod? gsum po thams cad ni/ /gtsang byed rnam pa gsum yin no/ /lus kyi la sogs mi dge ba/ /nyes par spyad pa gsum du 'dod/ /brnab sems
15a1(mdo 'grel): la sogs las min yang/ /yid kyi nyes spyad rnam gsum mo/ /bzlog pa legs par spyad pa yin/ /de las che long bsdus nas ni/ /dge dang mi dge ci rigs par/ /las kyi lam ni bcur gsungs so/ /mi
15a2(mdo 'grel): dge drug ni rnam rig min/ /gcig rnam gnyis so de dag kyang/ /byed na dge ba bdun rnams gnyis/ /ting 'dzin las skyes rnam rig byed/ /nyer bsdogs rnams ni rnam rig byed/ /rnam rig byed min 'gyur ba 'am/ /ma yin bzlog pa 'jug
15a3(mdo 'grel): yin no/ /sbyor ba rtsa ba gsum las skyes/ /de yi mjug thogs las byung phyir/ /brnab sems sogs rtsa gsum las skyes/ /dge ba sbyor dang 'jug bcas rnams/ /chags sdang gti mug med las skyes so/ /gsod dang gnod sems tshig rtsub
15a4(mdo 'grel): po/ /zhe sdang gis ni mthar phyin byed/ /log g.yem brnab sems ma byin len/ /chags pa yis ni rdzogs par byed/ /log par lta ba gti mug gis/ /lhag ma gsum gyis rdzogs par 'dod/ /gzhi ni sems can longs spyod dang/ /ming dang gzugs
15a5(mdo 'grel): dang ming yin no/ /snga dang mnyam du shi ba la/ /dngos med lus gzhan skyes phyir ro/ /dmag la sogs par don gcig phyir/ /thams cad byed pa po bzhin ldan/ /srog gcod pa ni bsams bzhin du/ /ma nor par ni gzhan bsad pa'o/
15a6(mdo 'grel): ma byin len pa gzhan gyi nor/ /mthu dang 'jab bus bdag gir byed/ /bgrod min bgrod par 'dod pa yis/ /log par g.yem pa rnam pa bzhi/ /brdzun tshig 'du shes gzhan sgyur ba'i/ /tshig don mngon par go ba'o/ /mig rna yid kyi
15a7(mdo 'grel): rnam shes dang/ /gsum gyis nyams su myong gang de/ /mthong thos rnam par shes pa dang/ /rtogs pa yin te rim bzhin bshad/ /phra ma pha rol dbye ba'i phyir/ /nyon mongs can gyi sems kyi tshig /tshig rtsub po ni mi snyan pa/ /nyon
15b1(mdo 'grel): mongs can kun bkyal ba nyid/ /gzhan ni de las gzhan nyon mongs/ /kha bsag glu dang zlos gang bzhin/ /bstan bcos ngan bzhin brnab sems ni/ /log pa gzhan gyi nor la chags/ /gnod sems sems can la ldang ba/ /dge dang mi
15b2(mdo 'grel): dge med lta ba/ /log par lta ba yin 'di la/ /gsum las bdun ni las kyang yin/ /med par lta bas rtsa ba gcod/ /'dod gtogs skyes nas thob pa rnams/ /rgyu dang 'bras la skur 'debs pas/ /kun gyis rim gyis mi'i nang du/ /
15b3(mdo 'grel): skyes pa bu med kyis gcod do/ /lta spyad de ni mi ldan pa'o/ /mtshams ni the tshom yod lta bas/ /mtshams med byed pa'i 'di la min/ /mi dge brgyad kyi bar dag dang/ /sems pa cig car lhan cig 'byung/ /dge ba bcu yi bar dag
15b4(mdo 'grel): dang/ /gcig dang brgyad dang lnga dang min/ /dmyal ba na ni bkyal ba dang/ /tshig rtsub gnod sems rnam gnyis so/ /brnab sems log lta ldan pas so/ /sgra mi snyan na gsum yod do/ /de na bdun pa dngos su yang/ /'dod pa gzhan
15b5(mdo 'grel): na mi dge bcu/ /dge ba gsum ni thams cad na/ /rnyed dang mngon du gyur sgo nas/ /gzugs med 'du shes med sems can/ /rnyed pas bdun yod lhag byas na/ /mngon du gyur pa'i sgo nas kyang/ /dmyal bcas sgra mi snyan ma gtogs/
15b6(mdo 'grel): thams cad bdag po rgyu mthun dang/ /rnam smin 'bras bu 'byin par 'dod/ /sdug bsngal phyir dang bsad phyir dang/ /gzi byin med phyir 'bras rnams gsum/ /lus dang ngag las chags las skyes/ /log 'tsho sbyang dka' i phyir logs
15b7(mdo 'grel): shig /bstan to gal te yo byad la/ /chags slang mdo dang 'gal phyir min/ /drir bcas spong ba'i lam dag gis/ /las ni lnga yis 'bras bur bcas/ /dri med bzhi yis zag bcas gzhan/ /dge dang mi dge gang yin pa'ang//
16a1(mdo 'grel): zag pa med pa lhag ma dang/ /lung bstan min gang gsum gyis so/ /dge ba'i dge la sogs pa ni/ /bzhi dang gnyis dang de bzhin gsum/ /mi dge'i dge sogs gnyis dang ni/ /gsum dang bzhi ste rim pa bzhin/ /
16a2(mdo 'grel): lung bstan min gyi dge la sogs/ /de dag gnyis dang gsum dang gsum/ /'das pa'i thams cad bzhi yin no/ /bar ma yi ni ma 'ongs pa'ang/ /bar ma gnyis so ma skyes pa'i/ /'bras bu ma 'ongs gsum yin no/ /rang gi
16a3(mdo 'grel): sa pa bzhi yin no/ /gzhan gyis pa gsum dang gnyis/ /slob pa'i slob la sogs pa gsum/ /mi slob las kyi 'bras bu ni/ /slob pa yi ni chos la sogs/ /gcig dang gnyis dang gsum yin no/ /de las gzhan pa'i 'bras
16a4(mdo 'grel): bu ni/ /slob sogs gnyis dang gnyis dang lnga/ /mthong bas spang bya'i de la sogs/ /gsum dang bzhi dang gcig yin no/ /bsgom pas spang bar bya las kyi/ /de dag gnyis dang bzhi dang gsum/ /spang bya min pa'i de dag gcig /gnyis
16a5(mdo 'grel): dang bzhi ste go rims bzhin/ /rims min bskyed pa nyon mongs can/ /kha cig cho ga nyams pa'ang zhes/ /gcig gis skye ba gcig 'phen to/ /yongs rdzogs byed pa du ma yin/ /sems med snyoms par 'jug pa dag /'phen byed ?
16a6(mdo 'grel): yin thob pa'ang min/ /mtshams med pa yi las rnams dang/ /nyon mongs shas chen ngan 'gro dang/ /'du shes med pa'i sems can dang/ /sgra mi snyan sgrib gsum du 'dod/ /mtshams med gling gsum dag na 'dod/ /za ma la sogs la
16a7(mdo 'grel): mi 'dod do/ /phan dang ngo tsha chung ba'i phyir/ /lhag ma 'gro ba lnga dag na/ /dge 'dun dbye na ni mi 'phrod pa'i/ /rang bzhin ldan pa ma yin chos/ /nyon mongs can min lung bstan min/ /de dang dge 'dun yang dag ldan/ /de yi kha na ma tho brdzun
16b1(mdo 'grel): de dang 'byed po yang dag ldan/ /bskal par mnar med par smin 'gyur/ lhag pas gnod pa lhag par 'gyur/ /dge slong lta spyad tshul ldan pas/ /'byed do gzhan du'o byis pa rnams/ /ston dang lam gzhan la bzod pa/ /byed po de ni mi gnas
16b2(mdo 'grel): so/ /de ni 'khor lo'i dben du 'dod/ /'dzam bu'i gling na'o dgu sogs kyis/ /las kyi dbyen ni gling gsum na/ /de ni brgyad dag yan chad kyis/ /dang po mdza' skyon zung gcig gi/ /snga rol thub pa nongs pa dang/ /mtshams ma
16b3(mdo 'grel): bcad pa dag tu yang/ /'khor lo'i dbyen ni mi 'byung ngo/ /phan 'dogs pa dang yon tan zhing/ /spangs dang med par byas phyir ro/ /mtshan ni gzhan du gyur dang 'gyur/ /gang zhig zla mtshan las byung ma/ /sangs rgyas brdeg par sems la
16b4(mdo 'grel): min/ /bsnun 'og dgra bcom pa la min/ /mtshams med sbyor ba byas pa la/ /'dod chags bral 'bras mi srid do/ /dge 'dun dbye phyir brdzun smra ba/ /kha na ma tho rab cher 'dod/ /'jig rten pa yi dge ba la/ /srid rtse'i sems
16b5(mdo 'grel): pa 'bras rab che/ /ma dgra bcom ma sun byas dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' des gnas dang/ /slob pa gsod dang dge 'dun gyi/ /'du ba'i sgo ni 'phrog pa dag /mtshams med pa dang cha 'dra ste/ /lnga pa mchod rten 'jig pa yin/ /bzod dang phyir
16b6(mdo 'grel): mi 'ong dgra bcom/ /'thob la las bgegs shin tu byed/ /gang nas byang chub sems dpa' yin/ /gang nas mtshan gyi las byed pa/ /bde 'gro rigs mthor skye dbang tshang/ /pho 'gyur tshe rabs dran mi ldog /de ni 'dzam gling pho 'gyur nyid/ /mngon
16b7(mdo 'grel): sum sangs rgyas la sems pa/ /bsams pa las byung bskal pa brgya/ /lus pa dag tu 'phen par byed/ /re re'ang bsod nams brgya las skyes/ /rnam gzigs mar mi rin chen gcug /grangs med gsum gyi tha mar byung/ /dang po shAkya?
17a1(mdo 'grel): thub pa yin/ /kun la thams cad snying rje yis/ /sbyin par byed pas sbyin pa rdzogs/ /chags bcas yan lag bcad kyang ni/ /mi 'khrug bzod dang tshul khrims kyi/ /skar rgyal bstod pas brtson 'grus kyi/ /de ma thag la ting
17a2(mdo 'grel): 'dzin blo'i/ /gsum po bsod nams bya ba dang/ /de'i gzhi dper na las lam bzhin/ /gang gis sbyin byed de sbyin pa/ /mchod dang phan gdags 'dod pa yis/ /lus dang ngag las slong dang bcas/ /bde 'bras longs spyod chen po
17a3(mdo 'grel): can/ /bdag gzhan don phyir gnyis don phyir/ /gnyis ka'i don du min phyir sbyin/ /de yi khyad par sbyin bdag dang/ /dngos dang zhing gi khyad par las/ /sbyin bdag khyad 'phags dang sogs kyis/ /gus la sogs pas sbyin par byed/ /de phyir
17a4(mdo 'grel): bkur sti rgya chen dang/ /dus dang bar chad med par rnyed/ /kha dog la sogs phun sum dngos/ /de las gzugs bzang grags ldan dang/ /dga' dang shin tu gzhon sha can/ /dus su reg na bde lus 'gyur/ /'gro dang sdug bsngal phan 'dogs
17a5(mdo 'grel): dang/ /yon tan rnams kyis zhing khyad 'phags/ /mchog na grol bas grol ba lam/ /byang chub sems dpa' yis brgyad pa/ /'phags pa min yang pha ma dang/ /nad pa dang ni chos smra dang/ /skye mdza' i byang chub sems dpa' la/ /yon ni
17a6(mdo 'grel): gzhal du med pa yin/ /mjug dang zhing dang bzhi dang ni/ /sbyor dang sems pa bsam pa ste/ /de dag chung dang che ba las/ /las kyang chung dang che ba nyid/ /bsams bzhin pa dang rdzogs pa dang/ /mi 'gyod gnyen po med pa dang/ /'khor dang rnam
17a7(mdo 'grel): par smin pa las/ /bsags pa'i las shes bya ba yin/ /mchod rten la btang rgyus byung ba'i/ /bsod nams len med byams sogs bzhin/ /rgyu las 'bras bu mi 'khrul phyir/ /ngan pa'i zhing la'ang 'bras yid 'ong/ /'chal ba'i tshul khrims
17b1(mdo 'grel): mi dge'i gzugs/ /de spong tshul khrims rnam gnyis so/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni bcad pa yang/ /rnam dag yon tan bzhi ldan no/ /tshul? khrims de'i rgyus 'phan ma byung/ /de'i gnyen po dang bzhi la brten/ /mnyam par bzhag pa'i dge ba ni/ /bsgom
17b2(mdo 'grel): pa'o sems la sgom phyir ro/ /mtho ris don du tshul khrims dang/ /'bral ba'i don du bsgom btso'i phyir/ /bskal par mtho ris dga' ba'i phyir/ /bzhi yi tshangs po'i bsod nams yin/ /chos sbyin nyon mongs can min pas/ /mdo sogs
17b3(mdo 'grel): yang dag ji bzhin ston/ /bsod nams mya ngan 'das pa dang/ /des 'byed cha mthun dge rnam gsum/ /rigs pas rab tu btsug pa'i las/ /rnam gsum kun klong bcas pa ni/ /yig 'bru brgya dang bgrang bcas pa'i/ /snyan ngag grangs te go
17b4(mdo 'grel): rim bzhin/ /bsgribs ngan kha na ma tho bcas/ /nyon mongs can chos dri med dge /gya nom 'dus byas dge bstan bya/ /thar pa bla na med pa yin/ /chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi tshig le'ur byas pa las las bstan pa zhes bya ba ste gnas
17b5(mdo 'grel): bzhi pa'o// //srid pa'i rtsa ba phra rgyas drug /'dod chags de bzhin khong khro dang/ /nga rgyal ma rig lta ba dang/ /the tshom yin te de drug kyang/ /'dod chags dbye bas bdun du bshad/ /khams gnyis las skyes srid 'dod chags/ /
17b6(mdo 'grel): kha ni nang du lta phyir der/ /thar ba'i 'du shes bzlog phyir bshad/ /lta ba lnga ste 'jig tshogs dang/ /log dang mthar 'dzin lta ba dang/ /lta ba dang ni tshul khrims dang/ /brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin dang bcu/ /de dag bcu dang bdun bdun brgyad/ /
17b7(mdo 'grel): lta ba gsum gnyis ma gtogs pa/ /'dod na sdug bsngal la sogs pa/ /mthong pas rim bzhin spong bar byed/ /bzhi ni bsgom pas spang bya yin/ /khong khro ma gtogs de dag nyid/ /gzugs khams gzugs med de dang 'dra/ /de ltar dgu
18a1(mdo 'grel): bcu brgyad du 'dod/ /srid rtse las skyes bzod pa yis/ /gzhom bya mthong bas spang bya nyid/ /lhag skyes mthong dang bsgom gnyis kyis/ /bzod pas gzhom min bsgom kho nas/ /bdag dang bdag gi rtag chad dang/ /med dang
18a2(mdo 'grel): dma' la mchog lta dang/ /rgyu min lam min de lta ba/ /de dag lta ba lnga yin no/ /dbang phyug sogs rgyur mngon zhen pa/ /rtag bdag phyin ci log pa yis/ /rab tu 'jug pas de phyir de/ /sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bya nyid/ /lta
18a3(mdo 'grel): ba gsum las phyin ci log /bzhi tshan phyin ci log pa dang/ /ngas rtog phyir dang sgro 'dogs phyir/ /sems dang 'du shes de'i dbang gis/ /nga rgyal bdun rnam dgu gsum po/ /mthong dang bsgom pas zad bya ba/ /bsgom pas spang bar bya ba
18a4(mdo 'grel): ni/ /gcod sogs kun nas bkris pa'o/ /de bzhin 'jig sred 'phags pa la/ /rnam sogs nga'o snyam mi 'byung/ /lta bas rgyas par 'gyur phyir ro/ /mi dge'i 'gyod pa'ang ma yin no/ /sdug bsngal rgyu mthong spang bya ba/ /lta dang de bzhin the tshom dang//
18a5(mdo 'grel): gang de lhan cig ma 'dres pa'i/ /ma rig gang yin kun tu 'gro /de dag las dgu gong du dmigs/ /lta ba gnyis po ma gtogs so/ /de dag dang ni lhan cig gang/ /'byung de'ang kun 'gro thob ma gtogs/ /'gog dang lam mthong
18a6(mdo 'grel): spang bya ba/ /log lta the tshom de dag dang/ /ldan pa 'ba' zhig ma rig dang/ /drug ni zag med/ spyod yul can/ /rang gi sa pa'i 'gog pa dang/ /lam ni phan tshun rgyu yin pas/ /sa drug sa dgu'i lam de yi/ /spyod tshul can gyi yul
18a7(mdo 'grel): yin no/ /'dod chags min te spang bya'i phyir/ /gnod mi byed phyir zhe sdang min/ /zhi dang dag dang mchog gyur phyir/ /nga rgyal ma yin mchog 'dzin min/ /phra rgyas kun tu 'gro rnams ni/ /dmigs pa'i sgo nas rang gi sa/ /thams cad du
18b1(mdo 'grel): ni rgyas par 'gyur/ /kun 'gro ma yin rang ris su/ /zag med gong ma'i yul can min/ /bdag gir ma byas gnyen po'i phyir/ /gang zhig gang dang mtshungs ldan pa/ /de ni der mtshungs ldan sgo nas/ /gong ma thams cad lung ma bstan/ /'dod na
18b2(mdo 'grel): 'jig tshogs lta ba dang/ /mthar 'dzin lhan cig ma rig pa'ang/ /lhag ma rnams 'dir mi dge ba'o/ /'dod na 'dod chags khong khro dang/ /rmongs rnams mi dge'i rtsa ba yin/ /lung ma bstan pa'i rtsa ba gsum/ /de ni sred dang ma rag blo/ /rnam
18b3(mdo 'grel): gnyis 'thor 'jug phyir de las/ /gzhan min bzhi zhes nyi 'og pa/ /de dag sred lta nga rgyal rmongs/ /bsam gtan pa gsum ma rig las/ /mgo gcig dang ni rnam phye dang/ /dri dang bzhag par lung bstan pa/ /'chi dang skye bar khyad par 'phags//
18b4(mdo 'grel): bdag gzhan la sogs lta bu yin/ /'das dang nyer gnas 'dod chags dang/ /khong khro nga rgyal dag gis ni/ /gang la de skyes ma spangs pa'i/ /dngos po de dang ldan pa yin/ /yid kyi de dag ma 'ongs pas/ /kun dang gzhan gyis rang
18b5(mdo 'grel): dus pa/ /mi skye rnams kyis thams cad dang/ /lhag ma kun gyis kun dang ldan/ /dus rnams kun tu yod gsungs phyir/ /gnyis phyir yul yod phyir 'bras phyir/ /de yod smra ba'i phyir thams cad/ /yod par smra bar 'dod de dag /rnam bzhi dngos
18b6(mdo 'grel): dang mtshan nyid dang/ /gnas skabs gzhan gzhan 'gyur zhes bya/ /gsum pa bzang ste bya ba yis/ /dus rnams rnam bzhag gegs su byed/ /de yang ji ltar gzhan ma yin/ /dus su mi rung de bzhin du/ /yod na ci phyir ma skyes
18b7(mdo 'grel): shig /chos nyid dag ni zab pa yin/ /sdug bsngal mthong spang bya spangs kyang/ /kun 'gro lhag ma rnams kyi ldan/ /dang po'i rnam pa spangs kyang nga'i/ /yul can dri ma lhag rnams kyis/ /sdug bsngal rgyu mthong goms pa yis/ /spang bya 'dod
19a1(mdo 'grel): khams las skyes pa/ /rang gi gsum dang gzugs gtogs cig /dri med rnam shes spyod yul lo/ /gzugs khams las skyes rang gi dang/ /'og gsum gong gcig dri med kyi'ang/ /gzugs med las skye khams
19a2(mdo 'grel): gsum gtogs/ /gsum dang zag med spyod yul lo/ /'gog dang lam mthong spang bya kun/ /rang gis klag pa'i spyod yul lo/ /zag med khams gsum mdza' gsum dang/ /zag pa med pa'i spyod yul lo/ /nyon mongs phra rgyas
19a3(mdo 'grel): bcas rnams gnyis/ nyon mongs can min rgyas 'gyur gyis/ /rmongs las the tshom de nas ni/ /log lta de nas 'jig tshogs lta/ /de nas mthar 'dzin de nas ni/ /tshul khrims mchog 'dzin de nas lta/ /rang gi lta la nga rgyal chags/ /
19a4(mdo 'grel): gzhen la zhe sdang de ltar rim/ /phra rgyas spangs pa ma yin dang/ /yul ni nye bar gnas pa dang/ /tshul bzhin ma yin yid byed las/ /nyon mongs rgyu ni tshang ba yin/ /'dod na gti mug ma gtogs pa'i/ /nyon mongs kun nas dkris bcas zag
19a5(mdo 'grel): gzugs dang gzugs ni med pa na/ /phra rgyas kho na srid pa'i zag /de lung ma bstan kha nang bltas/ /mnyam gzhag sa pa'i phyir gcig byas/ /rtsa ba ma rig yin pas na/ /logs shig tu ni zag par bstan/ /chu bo sbyor ba'ang de bzhin
19a6(mdo 'grel): du/ /lta rnams gsal phyir logs shig bstan/ /zag par ma yin grogs med rnams/ /'jog pa'i rjes su mi mthun lo/ /ji skad bshad nyid ma rig bcas/ /nyer len rnams te lta rnams gnyis/ /phye ba'i phyir ro ma rig pa/ /'dzin par
19a7(mdo 'grel): byed pa min phyir bsres/ /gang phyir de dag phra ba dang/ /rjes 'brel rnam gnyis rgyas 'gyur dang/ /rjes su 'brang ba de yi phyir/ /phra rgyas dag tu bshad pa yin/ /de dag 'jog byed zas byed dang/ /'khyer bar byed dang 'byor byed dang/ /nye bar
19b1(mdo 'grel): 'dzin phyir zag la sogs/ /de dag gi ni nges tshig yin/ /de dag kun tu sbyor sogs kyis/ /dbye bas yang rnam lngar bshad do/ /rdzas dang mchog 'dzin 'dra ba'i phyir/ /lta gnyis kun tu sbyor gzhan no/ /gang phyir gnyis ka'ang gcig tu ni/ /
19b2(mdo 'grel): mi dge rang dbang de yi phyir/ /phrag dog ser sna de dag las/ /logs shig kun sbyor gnyis su bshad/ /tha ma'i cha dang mthun rnam lnga/ /gnyis kyis 'dod las mi 'da' la/ /gsum po yis ni phyir zlog byed/ /sgo dang rtsa ba bsdus
19b3(mdo 'grel): phyir gsum/ /'gro mi 'dod dang lam nor dang/ /lam la the tshom de snyed gcig /thar pa bgrod la gegs byed pa/ de yi phyir na gsum bstan to/ /gong ma'i cha dang mthun lnga nyid/ /gzugs dang gzugs med las skyes pa'i/ /'dod chags
19b4(mdo 'grel): gnyis rgod nga rgyal rmongs/ /tshor ba'i dbang gis 'ching ba gsum/ /nyon mongs las gzhan nyon mongs can/ /sems byung 'du byed phung zhes pa/ /gang de'ang nye ba'i nyon mongs te/ /de dag nyon mongs zhes mi bya/ /ngo tsha med dang khrel
19b5(mdo 'grel): med dang/ /phra dog ser sna rgod pa dang/ /'gyod dang rmugs dang gnyid dang ni/ /kun nas dkris pa rnam pa brgyad/ /khro dang 'chab pa'o 'dod chags kyis/ /ngo tsha med rgod ser sna bslad/ /'chab pa rtsod ngo ma rig las/ /rmugs dang
19b6(mdo 'grel): gnyid dang khrel med do/ /the tshom las 'gyod khro ba dang/ /phra dog khong khro'i rgyu las byung/ /gzhan yang nyon mongs dri ma drug /sgyu dang g.yo dang rgyags pa dang/ /de bzhin 'tshig dang khon 'dzin dang/ /rnam 'tshe sgyu dang rgyags
19b7(mdo 'grel): pa ni/ /'dod chags las skyes khon 'dzin dang/ /rnam 'tshe khong khro las skyes so/ /'tshig pa lta ba mchog 'dzin las/ /g.yo ni lta bas kun nas bslad/ /de las ngo tsha med pa dang/ /khrel med rmugs
20a1(mdo 'grel): gnyid rgod rnam gnyis/ /de las gzhan ni bsgom spang bya/ /rang dbang de bzhin dri ma rnams/ /'dod na mi dge gsum rnam gnyis/ /de yan chad ni lung ma bstan/ /'dod nang bsam gtan
20a2(mdo 'grel): dang pho na/ /g.yo sgyu tshangs pa 'drid phyir ro/ /rmugs rgod rgyags pa khams gsum na/ /gzhan dag 'dod khams las skyes pa/ /mthong spang bya nyid nga rgyal bcas/ /yid kyi rnam shes sa pa yin/ /nye ba'i
20a3(mdo 'grel): nyon mongs rang dbang yang/ /gzhan ni rnam shes drug rten can/ /bde ba dag dang 'dod chags su/ /mtshungs ldan zhe sdang bzlog pa'o/ /ma rig pa dag thams cad dang/ /med lta yid bde sdug bsngal dang/ /yid mi
20a4(mdo 'grel): bde dang the tshom mo/ /gzhan yid bde dang 'dod las skyes/ /btang snyoms dang kun sa gong ma/ /sa ji bzhin du rang rang dang/ /'gyod dang phrag dog khro ba dang/ /rnam 'tshe khon du 'dzin pa dang/ /'tshig pa yid mi
20a5(mdo 'grel): bde ba dang/ /ser sna dag ni bzlog pa yin/ /g.yo dang sgyu dang 'chab pa nyid/ /gnyis ka dang ldan pa de dag /rgyags pa btang snyoms kun tu 'gro/ /bzhi po gzhan ni lnga dag dang/ /'dod na sgrib rnams mi mthun
20a6(mdo 'grel): dang/ /zas dang bya ba gcig pa'i phyir/ /gnyis gcig phung po gnod byed dang/ /the tshom phyir na lnga nyid do/ /dmigs pa yongs su shes pa dang/ /de la dmigs pa yang dag par/ /zad dang dmigs pa spangs
20a7(mdo 'grel): pas so/ /gnyen po skyes pas zad par 'gyur/ /gnyen po rnam bzhi spong ba dang/ /gzhi dang srid nyid rnam par ni/ /sun 'byin zhes bya dmigs pa las/ /nyon mongs pa ni spang byar 'dod/ /mtshan nyid mi mthun
20b1(mdo 'grel): mi mthun phyogs/ /yul rnams chad dang dus kyis te/ /'byung dang tshul khrims phyogs dang ni/ /dus gnyis ring ba nyid lta bu'o/ /lan cig tu zad de dag gi /bral ba'i thob pa yang dang yang/ /gnyen po skyes dang 'bras thob
20b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ /dbang po rnam par 'phel rnams su/ /yongs su shes dgu 'dod pa na/ /dang po rnam gnyis zad la gcig /gnyis zad pa ni de gnyis so/ /de bzhin gong ma'i de gsum nyid/ /yongs su shes pa gzhan gsum ste/ /
20b3(mdo 'grel): tha ma'i cha dang mthun gzugs dang/ /zag pa kun zad drug bzod 'bras/ /lhag ma rnams ni shas pa'i yin/ /mi lcogs med 'bras thams cad do/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi lnga 'am brgyad/ /nye bar bsdogs pa'i gcig
20b4(mdo 'grel): yin te/ /gzugs med dngos gzhi gsum gyi yang/ /thams cad 'phags pa'i lam gyi yin/ /'jig rten pa'i gnyis rjes kyi'ang/ /chos shes pa'i ni gsum yin no/ /de'i phyogs mthun gyi drug dang lnga/ /bral
20b5(mdo 'grel): ba'i thob pa zag med dang/ /srid rtse nyams par byas pa dang/ /rgyu gnyis kun du bcom pa'i phyir/ /yongs shes khams las 'das pa la/ /gcig min mthong pa gnas pa ni/ /lnga yi bar dang yang dag ldan/ /bsgom
20b6(mdo 'grel): la gnas pa drug gam ni/ /gcig gam yang na gnyis dang ngo/ /khams las 'dod chags bral ba dang/ /'bras bu thob phyir de dag bsdoms/ /la la gcig gnyis lnga dang drug /gtod ste 'thob pa lnga min no/ /chos
20b7(mdo 'grel): mngon pa'i mdzod kyi tshig le'ur byas pa las phra rgyas bstan pa zhes bya ba ste gnas lnga pa'o// //bden pa mthong zhing bsgom pa las/ /nyon mongs spangs pa zhes bshad pa/ /bsgom pa'i lam ni rnam pa
21a1(mdo 'grel): gnyis/ /mthong ba zhes bya zag pa med/ /bden pa dag ni bzhir bshad do/ /sdug bsngal kun 'byung de bzhin du/ /'gog dang lam ste de ltar na/ /de dag ji ltar mngon rtogs rim/ /yid 'ong yin
21a2(mdo 'grel): du mi 'ong dang/ /de las gzhan zag bcas rnams nyid/ /sdug bsngal nyid gsum ldan pa'i phyir/ /ci rigs ma lus sdug bsngal lo/ /gang la bcom dang blo yi gzhan/ /bsal na de blo mi 'jug pa/ /bum chu
21a3(mdo 'grel): bzhin du kun rdzob tu/ /yod de don dam yod gzhan no/ /tshul gnas thos dang bsam ldan pas/ /bsgom pa la ni rab tu sbyor/ /thos sogs las byung blo rnams ni/ /ming dang gnyis ka don yul can/ /bsrings
21a4(mdo 'grel): gnyis ldan chog mi shes dang/ /'dod chen can la ma yin no/ /rnyed la yang sred chog mi shes/ /ma rnyed la 'dod 'dod chen can/ /bzlog pa de yi gnyen po dag/ de gnyis kham gsum gtogs dri med/ /ma chags
21a5(mdo 'grel): 'phags rigs de dag las/ /gsum ni chog shes bdag nyid do/ /gsum gyis tshul bstan tha mas las/ /sred pa skye ba'i gnyen po'i phyir/ /bdag gir bdag 'dzin dngos 'dod pa/ /de yi dus dang gtan zhi'i
21a6(mdo 'grel): phyir/ /de la 'jug pa mi sdug dang/ /dbugs rdub 'byung ba dran pa yis/ /'dod chags rnam rtog lhags rnams so/ /keng rus chags bcas thams cad la/ /rus ba rgya mtsho'i bar du ni/ /spro zhing sdud pas las dang po/ /
21a7(mdo 'grel): rkang rus nas ni thod phyed bar/ /btang bas spyad ba byas par bshad/ /smin ma'i bar du sems 'dzin pas/ /yid la byed pa rdzogs pa yin/ /mi sdug ma chags sa bcu dang/ /dmigs pa 'dod snang mis bskyed do/ /dbugs rdub
21b1(mdo 'grel): dbugs 'byung dran pa ni/ /shes rab sa lnga spyod yul rlung/ /'dod rten phyi ma'i ma yin no/ /bgrang la sogs pa rnam pa drug /dbugs rdub dbugs 'byung gang las lus/ /sems can zhes bya ma zin pa'o/ /rgyu mthun las byung 'og ma
21b2(mdo 'grel): yi/ /yid kyis de gnyis mi gtogs so/ /zhi gnas grub par gyur pa yis/ /dran pa nyer gzhag bsgom par bya/ /lus tshor sems dang chos rnams la/ /mtshan nyid gnyis su yongs brtags pas/ /shes rab thos sogs
21b3(mdo 'grel): las byung ba'o/ /gzhan ni 'brel dang dmigs pa las/ /rim ni ji ltar skye ba bzhin/ /phyin ci log gi gnyen por bzhi/ /de ni chos dran nyer gzhag pa/ /spyi la dmigs pa la gnas te/ /de dag la ni mi rtag dang/ /sdug bsngal
21b4(mdo 'grel): stong bdag med par lta'o/ /de las dro bar gyur pa 'byung/ /de ni bden bzhi'i spyod yul can/ /rnam pa bcu drug dro ba las/ /rtse mo de yang de dang 'dra/ /gnyis ka chos kyis rnam pa gtod/ /gzhan dag gis kyang 'phel bar byed/ /
21b5(mdo 'grel): de las bzod pa gnyis de bzhin/ /thams cad chos kyi 'phel bar byed/ /chen po 'dod gtogs sdug bsngal yul/ /de ni skad cig gcig de bzhin/ /chos mchog thams cad phung po lnga/ /thob pa ma gtogs de ltar na/
21b6(mdo 'grel): nges 'byed cha mthun rnam pa bzhi/ /bsgoms byung mi lcogs med pa dang/ /khyad par bsam gtan sa pa'o/ /gnyis ni 'og na'ang yod pa 'am/ /'dod rten chos mchog bud med kyis/ /gnyis ka'i rten can 'thob par 'gyur/
21b7(mdo 'grel): 'phags pas de dag sa bor nas/ /gtor ngo 'phags min 'chi pas so/ /dang po gnyis 'ongs nyams pas kyang/ /dngos gzhis de nyid la bden mthong/ /rnam par nyams na sngon med 'thob/ /nyams pa gnyis ni mi ldan pa/ /
22a1(mdo 'grel): rtse mo thob pa rtsa mi 'chad/ /bzod thob ngan song mi 'gro'o/ /gnyis slob rigs las bzlog nas ni/ /sangs rgyas su 'gyur gzhan gsum yang/ /ston dang bse ru byang chub bar/ /bsam gtan mdza' rten
22a2(mdo 'grel): gcig la kun/ /de yi sngon du thar cha mthun/ myur ba srid pa gsum gyis thar/ /thos bsams las byung las gsum mo/ /mi yi nang nas 'phen par byed/ /'jig rten pa yi chos mchog las/ /chos kyi bzod pa zag pa med/ /
22a3(mdo 'grel): 'dod sdug bsngal la de nas ni/ /de nyid la chos shes de bzhin/ /sdug bsngal lhag la rjes bzod shes/ /bden pa gsum la'ang de bzhin no/ /de ltar bden pa ma don rtogs 'di/ /sems bcu drug go rnam gsum ste/ /
22a4(mdo 'grel): mthong dmigs bya ba zhes bya'o/ /de ni chos mchog dang sa gcig /bzod dang shes pa go rims bzhin/ /bar chad med dang rnam grol lam/ /de las skad cig bco lnga ni/ /ma mthong mthong phyir mthong ba'i lam/ /dbang po
22a5(mdo 'grel): rno rtul de dag tu/ /dad dang chos kyi rjes 'brang ba/ /bsgoms pas spang bya ma spangs na/ /'bras bu dang po la zhugs pa/ /rnam lnga'i bar bcom gnyis pa la/ /dgu pa tshun chad zad pa yin/ /'dod pa 'am yang na gong ma las//
22a6(mdo 'grel): chags bral gsum pa la zhugs pa/ /gang zhig gang la zhugs pa ni/ /bcu drug pa la de 'bras gnas/ /de tshe dbang po rno rtul dag /dad pas mos dang mthong bas thob/ /'bras thob 'bras bu khyad bar gyi/ /lam thob med pas de yi
22a7(mdo 'grel): phyir/ /'bras gnas khyad par bya ba'i phyir/ /mi brtson pa ni zhugs ma yin/ /sa dang sa na nyes rnam dgu/ /de bzhin du ni yon tan rnams/ /chung dang 'bring dang che rnams kyi/ /chung ngu la sogs tha dad phyir/ /'bras gnas bsgom
22b1(mdo 'grel): bya? spang ma zad/ /de ltar thogs na lan bdun pa/ /rnam gsum rnam bzhi las grol ba/ /tshe gnyis gsum du rigs nas rigs/ /rnam pa lnga yi bar bcom pa/ /gnyis pa la ni zhugs pa'ang yin/ /rnam pa drug pa zad gyur pa/ /
22b2(mdo 'grel): de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba/ /nyes cha bdun dang brgyad zad ba/ /tshe gcig bar chad gcig pa dang/ /gsum pa la ni zhugs pa'ang yin/ /de dgu zad pas phyir mi 'ong/ /de ni bar skyes 'du byed dang/ /'du byed med
22b3(mdo 'grel): yongs mya ngan 'da' / /gong du 'pho ba rnams de ni/ /bsam gtan spel na 'og min 'gro/ /de 'phar byed mthar thams cad du/ /'chi 'pho gzhan srid rtse mor 'gro/ /gzhan ni gzugs med 'gro rnam bzhi/ /
22b4(mdo 'grel): gzhan ni 'di la mya ngan 'da' / /gsum la yang rnam gsum phye nas/ /gzugs su nyer 'gro dgur bshad do/ /de dag gi ni khyad par rnams/ /las dbang nyon mongs bye brag las/ /gong du 'pho ba ma phye bar/ /
22b5(mdo 'grel): dam pa'i 'gro ba bdun du 'dod/ /dam pa dam min 'jug mi 'jug /son pa phyir mi 'ong phyir te/ /'dod par che yongs gyur pa'i 'phags/ /khams gzhan du ni 'gro ba med/ /de dag gong mar skyes pa ni/ /yongs nyams
22b6(mdo 'grel): dbang po 'pho mi bsten/ /dang po bzhi la spel bar byed/ /skad cig ma ni bsres pas 'grub/ /skye dang gnas par bya phyir dang/ /nyon mongs pas ni 'jigs phyir yang/ /de ni rnam pa lnga yi phyir/ /gnas gtsang skye ba
22b7(mdo 'grel): lnga kho na/ /'gog pa thob pa'i phyir mi 'ongs/ /lus kyis mngon sum byed par 'dod/ /srid rtse'i bar chad brgyad zad pa/ /dgra bcom nyid la zhugs pa yin/ /dgu pa'i bar chad med lam yang/ /de ni rdo rje lta bu
23a1(mdo 'grel): yin/ /de zad thob dang zad pa shes/ /de tshe de mi slob dgra bcom/ /'jig rten 'das kyi srid rtse las/ /chags bral gzhan las rnam pa gnyis/ /'jig rten pa yis chags bral ba'i/ /'phags
23a2(mdo 'grel): la bral ba'i thob rnam gnyis/ /kha cig 'jig rten 'das kyis kyang/ /btang la nyon mongs mi ldan phyir/ /srid rtse'i phyed las rnam grol dang/ /gong du skyes pa bzhin mi ldan/ /zag med mi lcogs med pa yis/ /thams
23a3(mdo 'grel): cad las ni 'dod chags 'bral/ /sa gsum rgyal la bsal gtan nam/ /nyer bsdogs las mdza' i rnam grol lam/ /gong ma'i nyer sdogs las min 'phags/ /brgyad kyis rang gong sa las rgyal/ /'jig rten pa'i
23a4(mdo 'grel): rnam grol dang/ /bar chad med lam go rims bzhin/ /zhi sogs rags sogs rnam pa can/ /gong dang 'og ma'i spyod yul can/ /gal te mi g.yo'i zad shes las/ /mi skye'i blo gros gal te min/ /zad pa shes
23a5(mdo 'grel): sam mi shes lta/ /de ni dgra bcom thams cad la/ /dge sbyong tshul ni dri med lam/ /'bras bu 'dus byas 'dus ma byas/ /de dag brgyad cu rtsa dgu'o/ /grol lam zad pa rnam dang bcas/ /'bras bu bzhir rnam gzhag
23a6(mdo 'grel): pa ni/ /rgyu lnga dag ni srid phyir ro/ /'bras la sngon lam btang ba dang/ /gzhan thob pa dang zad bsdoms dang/ /shes pa brgyad tshan thob pa dang/ /rnam pa bcu drug thob pa'o/ /'jig rten pa yis thob 'bras ni/ /bsres
23a7(mdo 'grel): dang zag med thob 'dzin phyir/ /de nyid tshangs tshul tshangs pa yi/ /'khor lo tshangs pas bskor phyir ro/ /chos kyi 'khor lo mthong ba'i lam/ /myur bar 'gro sogs rtsibs sogs kyis/ /'dod par gsum 'thob tha ma
23b1(mdo 'grel): ni/ /gsum du'o gong na mthong lam med/ /mi skyo lung las 'dis rtsom zhing/ /der mthar phyin ces 'byung phyir ro/ /dgra bcom drug 'dod de dag las/ /lnga ni dad pas mos las skyes/ /de dag rnam grol dus dang sbyor/ /
23b2(mdo 'grel): mi g.yo'i chos can mi g.yo ba/ /de phyir de dus mi sbyor grol/ /de ni mthong thob rgyu las byung/ /kha cig dang po nas de'i rigs/ /kha cig sbyangs pa las gyur to/ /bzhi ni rigs las lnga 'bras las/ /nyams gyur dang
23b3(mdo 'grel): po las ma yin/ /slob dang 'phags min rigs drug ldan/ /mthong ba la ni 'pho ba med/ /thob dang ma thob nyer spyad las/ /yongs nyams rnam pa gsum zhes bya/ /ston la tha ma mi g.yo la/ /bar ma'ang gzhan
23b4(mdo 'grel): la rnam gsum mo/ /'bras las nyams pa 'chi ba med/ /bya ba ma yin de mi byed/ /mi g.yo rnam grol bar chad med/ /lam dgu'o shin du bsten phyir ro/ /mthong bas thob la re re'o/ /zag med mi yi nang du
23b5(mdo 'grel): 'phel/ /mi slob sa dgu la rten te/ /slob pa drug la gang gi phyir/ /'phel la 'bras bu khyad par can/ /btang ste 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas gnyis dang nyan thos bdun/ /de dgu dbang po rnam
23b6(mdo 'grel): dgu can/ /gang zag bdun po sbyor ba dang/ /dbang po snyoms 'jug rnam grol dang/ /gnyis kas byas pa'o de dag drug /'di ltar lam gsum la gnyis gnyis/ /'gog thob gnyis ka las rnam grol/ /shes
23b7(mdo 'grel): rab kyis ni cig shos so/ /snyoms mjug dbang po 'bras rnams kyis/ /slob pa yongs rdzogs shes bya'o/ /gnyis kyis mi slob yongs su rdzogs/ /mdor na lam ni rnam bzhi ste/ /khyad par can dang rnam grol
24a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ /bar chad med dang sbyor zhes bya/ /bsam gtan dag gi lam rnams la/ /sa gzhan dag gi dka' ba yin/ /blo rtul mngon shes bu la ba ste/ /cig shos kyis ni mngon shes myur/ /zad dang mi skye shes
24a2(mdo 'grel): pa ni/ /byang chub de dang mthun nyid phyir/ /sum cu rtsa bdun de'i phyogs mthun/ /ming gi sgo nas rdzas su bcu/ /dad dang brtson 'grus dran pa dang/ /shes rab ting 'dzin btang snyoms dga' / /rtog dang tshul khrims shin du sbyangs//
24a3(mdo 'grel): dran pa nyer gzhag shes rab ste/ /brtson 'grus yang dag 'jog ces bya/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa ting 'dzin to/ /gtso bo smos pa de dag ni/ /sbyor byung yon tan kun kyang yin/ /sde tshan bdun ni go rim bzhin/ /las ni dngos po dag
24a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ /nges 'byed cha mthun rnams dang ni/ /bsgom dang mthong la rab tu phye/ /byang chub yan lag lam yan lag /zag pa med gzhan rnam gnyis so/ /bsam gtan dang po na thams cad/ /mi lcogs med na dga' ma
24a5(mdo 'grel): gtogs/ /gnyis pa na ni rtog ma gtogs/ /gnyis na de gnyis ma gtogs pa/ /bsam gtan bar na'ang gzugs med pa/ /gsum na'ang de dang tshul yan lag/ byang chub dang ni lam yan lag /ma gtogs
24a6(mdo 'grel): 'dod khams srid rtse nas/ /bden gsum mthong na tshul khrims dang/ /chos la shes nas dad pa 'thob/ /lam mngon rtogs na sangs rgyas dang/ /de yi dge 'dun dag la yang/ /chos bden gsum dang rang sangs
24a7(mdo 'grel): rgyas/ /byang chub sems dpa' i lam yin no/ /rdzas su gnyis te dad pa dang/ /tshul khrims dri ma med pa yin/ /bcings phyir slob pa'i yan lag tu/ /rnam grol ma bshad de rnam gnyis/ /nyon mongs bcom pa 'dus ma
24b1(mdo 'grel): byas/ /mos pa 'dus byas yan lag ni/ /de yin de nyid rnam grol gnyis/ /byang chub ji skad bshad shes pa/ /mi slob sems ni skye 'gyur ba/ /sgrib pa las ni rnam grol 'gyur/ /'gag par 'gyur ba'i lam gyis ni//
24b2(mdo 'grel): de yi sgrib pa rab tu spong/ /'dus ma byas nyid khams shes bya/ /'dod chags kun zad 'dod chags bral/ /spangs pa'i khams na gzhan dag go /'gog pa'i khams shes bya ba bzhi/ /sdug bsngal rgyu bzod shes rnams
24b3(mdo 'grel): kyis/ /yid 'byung gang gis spong 'gyur ba/ /kun gyis 'dod chags 'bral bar 'gyur/ /de lta na ni mu bzhi srid/ /chos mngon pa mdzad kyi tshig le'ur byas pa las lam dang gang zag bstan pa zhes bya ba gnas drug pa'o// //
24b4(mdo 'grel): dri med bzod rnam shes pa yin/ /zad dang mi skye'i blo lta min/ /de las gzhan 'phags blo gnyis ka/ gzhan shes drug ni lta ba'ang yin/ /shes pa zag bcas zag pa med/ /dang po kun rdzob ces bya'o/ /zag med rnam gnyis chos dang
24b5(mdo 'grel): ni/ /rjes su shes pa kho na yin/ /kun rdzob yul ni thams cad do/ /chos shes bya ba'i spyod yul ni/ /'dod sdug bsngal sogs rjes shes pa'i/ /spyod yul gong ma'i sdug bsngal sogs/ /de dag nyid bden bye//
24b6(mdo 'grel): brag gis/ /bzhi ste rnam bzhi de dag ni/ /mi skye ba dang zad pa shes/ /de gnyis dang po skyes pa ni/ /sdug bsngal rgyu rjes shes pa yin/ /bzhi las pha rol sems rig pa/ /des ni sa dbang gang zag 'das/ /
24b7(mdo 'grel): zhig dang ma skyes ma rig go /chos rjes blo phyogs phan tshun min/ /nyan thos mthong ba'i skad cig gnyis/ /rig ste bse ru lta bus gsum/ /sangs rgyas sbyor ba med pa kun/ /zad pa shes pa bden rnams la/ /yongs 
25a1(mdo 'grel): shes la sogs nges pa'o/ /yongs shes bya ba med la sogs/ /mi skye ba yi blor 'dod do/ /rang bzhin dang ni gnyen po dang/ /rnam pa rnam pa spyod yul dang/ /sbyor dang bya ba byas nyid dang/ /rgyu rgyas pa las
25a2(mdo 'grel): bcu yin no/ /bsgom pa'i lam la 'gog pa 'am/ /lam la chos shes gang yin de/ /khams gsum gyi ni gnyen po yin/ /'dod pa'i khams kyi rjes ma yin/ /chos shes pa dang rjes su shes/ /rnam pa bcu drug
25a3(mdo 'grel): kun rdzob ni/ /de bzhin gzhan duAng rang rang gi /bden pa'i rnam pas bzhi yin no/ /pha rol yid shes dri med kyang/ /de bzhin dri ma dang bcas ni/ /shes bya'i rang gi mtshan nyid rnams/ /rdzas re re zhig spyod yul lo/ /
25a4(mdo 'grel): lhag ma rnam pa bcu bzhi can/ /stong dang bdag med ma gtogs so/ /dri med bcu drug gzhan rnam med/ /gzhan yod ces pa bstan bcos las/ /rdzas su rnam pa bcu drug go /rnam pa shes rab dang bcas pa'i/ /dmigs
25a5(mdo 'grel): dang bcas pas 'dzin par byed/ /yod pa thams cad gzung bya yin/ /dbang po rnam gsum gzhan rnams dge /dang po sa rnams thams cad na/ /drug na chos shes bya dgu na/ /rjes shes bya ba de bzhin drug /gzhan yid shes pa bsam
25a6(mdo 'grel): gtan bzhin/ /de ni 'dod dang gzugs rten can/ /chos shes bya ba 'dod rten can/ /khams gsum pa yi rten can gzhan/ /'gog blo dran pa nyer gzhag pa/ /gcig ste pha rol sems blo ni/ /gsum mo lhag ma bzhi yin no/ /
25a7(mdo 'grel): chos blo'i spyod yul dgu yin no/ /lam rjes blo yi dgu yin no/ /sdug bsngal rgyu blo gnyis yin no/ /bzhi yi bcu yin gcig gi min/ /chos bcu dag ni sbyar bar bya/ /khams gsum pa dang dri med chos/ /'dus ma byas rnams
25b1(mdo 'grel): gnyis gnyis so/ /kun rdzob gcig pus rang tshogs las/ /gzhan ni bdag med nyid rig 'gyur/ /zag med skad cig dang po la/ /chags can shes pa gcig dang ldan/ /gnyis pa la gsum yan chad ni/ /bzhi la re re 'phel dang ldan/ /mthong
25b2(mdo 'grel): ba'i lam la bzod pa dang/ /shes pa ji ltar skyes pa rnams/ /ma 'ongs pa 'thob de nyid la/ /rjes gsum la ni kun rdzob kyang/ /de phyir mngon rtogs mdza' zhes bya/ /de ni mi skye'i chos can yin/ /rang dang 'og sa 'gog pa'i mdza' / /
25b3(mdo 'grel): rang bden rnam can 'bad las byung/ /chags bcas bcu drug pa la drug /'dod las chags dang bral bas bdun/ /de yi gong ma chags bcas kyi/ /bsgom pa'i lam la bdun thob po/ /sa bdun las rgyal mngon shes dang/ /mi g.yo
25b4(mdo 'grel): 'thob dang spel bsgom pa'o/ /bar chad med pa'i lam dag dang/ /gong ma'i grol ba'i lam brgyad la 'ang/ /slob pa spyod pa'i grol ba la/ /shes pa drug dang bdun 'thob bam/ /bar chad med pa'i lam la drug /de bzhin srid rtse'i rnam rgyal
25b5(mdo 'grel): la'ang/ /zad pa'i shes pa la dgu'o/ /mi g.yo bas ni bcu 'thob po/ /der 'pho grol ba'i tha ma la'ang/ /bshad pa'i lhag ma la brgyad 'thob/ /gang las chags bral bya phyir gang/ /thob pa der yang 'og ma'ang 'thob/ /zad pa
25b6(mdo 'grel): shes la zag bcas kyang/ /sa kun sngon rnyed mi 'thob po/ /rnyed dang bstan ces bya ba ni/ /dge ba 'dus byas thob pa'o/ /gnyen po dang ni thag srid pa'i/ /thob pa zag dang bcas pa'i yin/ /sangs rgyas chos ni ma 'dres pa/ /stobs la
25b7(mdo 'grel): sogs pa bco brgyad do/ /gnas dang gnas min shes pa bcu/ /las 'bras la brgyad bsam gtan sogs/ /dbang po mos dang khams la ni/ /dgu'o lam dag la bcu 'am/ /gnyis ni kun rdzob shes pa yin/ /zad pa drug gam bcu
26a1(mdo 'grel): yin no/ /sngon gnas 'chi 'pho skye ba'i stobs/ /bsam gtan dag na lhag pa ni/ /sa rnams kun na ci yi phyir/ /'di'i stobs gang phyir thogs mi mnga' / /sku la sred med bu yi stobs/ /gzhan dang tshig na glang chen
26a2(mdo 'grel): sogs/ /bdun cu glags pa'i stobs yin no/ /de ni reg bya'i skye mched do/ /mi 'jigs pa ni rnam pa bzhi/ /ji ltar stobs ni dang po dang/ /bcu pa gnyis pa bdun pa bzhin/ /dran dang shes bzhin bdag nyid gsum/ /thugs rje
26a3(mdo 'grel): chen po kun rdzob blo/ /tshogs dang rnam pa spyod yul dang/ /mnyam pa'i phyir dang chas che'i phyir/ /tha dad bya ba rnam pa brgyad/ /sangs rgyas thams cad tshogs dang ni/ /chos sku 'gro ba'i don spyod pas/ /mnyam pa nyid de sku tshe dang//
26a4(mdo 'grel): rigs dang sku bong tshod kyis min/ /chos gzhan slob dang thun mong min/ /kha cig so so'i skye bo dang/ /nyon mongs med dang smon nas shes/ /so so yang dag rigs mngon sogs/ /nyon mongs med pa kun rdzob shes/ /bsam
26a5(mdo 'grel): gtan mdza' na mi g.yo'i chos/ /mis skyed nyon mongs 'dod gtogs pa/ /ma skyes bzhir bcas spyod yul can/ /smon nas shes pa'ang de bzhin no/ /de yi dmigs pa thams cad do/ /de bzhin chos don nges tshig dang/ /
26a6(mdo 'grel): spobs pa so so yang dag rig /gsum ni go rims bzhin ming dang/ /don dang dag la thog med shes/ /bzhi pa rigs pa thags thogs med/ /mngon brjod lam la dbang nyid la/ /de yi dmigs pa dag dang lam/ /shes
